programme.title: Scrappers
programme.desc: Trading scrap metal is like playing the stock market. From a small collection point, scrap metal goes a long way to collect and segregate before it reaches the furnace. The steel mills order batches of appropriately selected and prepared raw materials in a specified quantity and time. To trade scrap metal, you must have the ability to do business as well as luck. This program invites you to meet people who work in scrap yards all over Poland.

programme.title: Expedition Files
programme.desc: Josh Gates takes a deep dive into the lives and true identities of the notorious Billy the Kid, the Man in the Iron Mask, and Betty and Barney Hill.

programme.title: Expedition Files
programme.desc: Clues from the Zodiac Killer are finally deciphered. A million-dollar treasure is revealed. An ancient manuscript may explain the origins of life.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Meet modern-day treasure hunter Drew Pritchard. With demanding customers, high turnover, and one of the biggest decorative salvage yards in the UK, Drew is constantly on the road, crisscrossing the country in search of derelict gems and forgotten remnants. Drew loves the thrill of the hunt and while he gets his hands dirty in the countrys architectural backwaters, his team of restorers is back at the shop giving old and rare finds a new lease on life!

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Meet modern-day treasure hunter Drew Pritchard. Drew loves the thrill of the hunt and while he gets his hands dirty in the countrys architectural backwaters, his team of restorers is back at the shop giving old and rare finds a new lease on life!

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: How Do They Do It? Ever wondered how the stripes get into toothpaste or how contact lenses are made? How do goods get from one country to another and then into our supermarkets? What are car tires made from and exactly why are plasma TV screens flat? Eating, drinking, driving, flying. These all are activities that we carry out with barely a second thought. But have you ever wondered what exactly goes into your teabag and how it got there? How does an airport handle hundreds of thousands of items of luggage each day? And just how can a cars airbag inflate so quickly? Every day – often without even realizing it – we come into contact with technology, be it in the bathroom, in the car or on the golf course. We take a look at how things work, and focus on some of the most amazing examples of everyday objects including the worlds fastest elevator and the most expensive chocolate money can buy.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. The budget is limited, though you can see some exclusive and rare cars. Mike Brewer, a British dealer chooses the car carefully and hands it over to the mechanic, first Edd China, later Ant Anstead to be fixed and upgraded. The hosts are real masters of their trade, it seems they can bring life even to a piece of metal. It does not matter if you are a life-long car enthusiast or do not even have a driving license you will admire the results of hard work from the beginning to the end of the long uneasy restoring process.

programme.title: Junk Gypsies
programme.desc: Docusoap that follows two sisters, designers and owners of a company called Junk Gypsy Co. based in Round Top, Texas - Amie and Jolie Sikes, who go to various flea markets and hunt for junk that they can turn into high-end decor, which they use to transform homes of their clients. These unique women, whose clientele includes country music stars and Hollywood actors, and have a large and passionate social media fan base, find beauty and value in items that would otherwise end up in the trash.

programme.title: The Last Woodsmen
programme.desc: Jared moves into an abandoned logging camp, placing a $250,000 bet on a remote, dangerous site that will either sink or save his business.

programme.title: The Last Woodsmen
programme.desc: Drowning in debt, Jared fights to keep his business afloat and his workers employed when "fowl play" threatens to sink his float camp.

programme.title: American Loggers
programme.desc: The Pelletier family contend with an employee in need. But will lending money lead to even more financial difficulties than before?

programme.title: Extreme Vacation Homes
programme.desc: From a medieval Tuscan villa with some startling secrets to a hidden Caribbean fortress in a tropical oasis, check out some of the worlds most extreme vacation homes.

programme.title: Extreme Vacation Homes
programme.desc: Thailand, Laguna Beach, Washington. From a stunning villa in the Himalayas of Thailand to a Laguna Beach mansion, discover some of the worlds most extreme vacation homes.

programme.title: Tiny House Hunters
programme.desc: Reality series showing American house hunters who are considering joining the tiny-house revolution where people are choosing to live in smaller homes - often less than 55 square metres -and praising their benefits. In this property series realtors present three petite houses to prospective buyers. Some of the homes would be used as permanent residences whilst others could be a retreat to escape to. There are various reasons for the trend for tiny-living; some people are doing it for financial reasons, others are trying to live more ecologically and some yearn for a simpler lifestyle. When the potential tiny-homeowners are faced with the practical limitations of the properties on offer will they take the plunge and embrace the joys of tiny living? Or will they change their minds for more spacious accommodation?

programme.title: Amazing Water Homes
programme.desc: Captivating docu-reality series in which Rebecca Budig shows viewers some of the worlds most amazing, luxurious and extraordinary water featured homes. You will have a chance to see what happens when you combine creativity, ingenuity and lots and lots of water when she takes us on a tour of cool properties such as a private water parks, islands and lakes, luxury houseboats and yachts with every amenity imaginable including a private crew.

programme.title: In The Eye Of The Storm
programme.desc: In December 2021, an out of season long-track tornado travels across Western Kentucky in the dead of night leaving a trail of destruction.

programme.title: Sin City Tow
programme.desc: Tensions run high as the year ends. Elmer has a blowout with his boss, Pineapple rips into a new driver, and Nick deals with a raging customer.

programme.title: Sin City Tow
programme.desc: Its NYE in Vegas and things get wild: partygoers hit Ashleys, Elmer makes a life-changing choice, and Pineapple faces his bosss wrath.

programme.title: Border Control Sweden
programme.desc: Alex talks to a man acting strange and when checking the mans luggage, he finds something even more strange. A German couple lies about what is in their trunk.

programme.title: Border Control: Spain
programme.desc: Going through customs can be a stressful experience for most people, even more so if youre attempting to smuggle drugs or weapons into the country. Follow the efforts of the Security and Customs Services at the border of Spain, as they work hard to keep their country safe from criminals. Whether its drugs, weapons or even terrorism, theres a lot of things security have to consider in order to make sure all threats are handled properly. These security forces are always hot on the trail of suspicious activity, in the air, on land or away at sea.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: Gold Rush is a reality television series that follows the placer gold mining efforts of various family-run mining companies in boundless north of America. The series focuses on the work process in the conditions of permafrost and working relations between the participants. The show has 10 seasons altogether. In some episodes participants start the adventure and travel to Alaska to search for gold because of financial issues. They do not have any previous experience and have to learn on the job. Then there appears several gold mining teams that compete with each other. In some episodes the teams move to South America. Admire the courage and determination of the team members in their unstoppable desire to become rich.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers
programme.desc: Expert craftsmen are bringing Drew Pritchards finds back to life and restore them to their former glory. Drew hunts for treasures such as derelict gems and forgotten remnants across the country. And then he and his team do the restoration turning trash to gold, so that worn objects become shining gems for which Drews customers want to pay a lot of money. All kinds of items can and will be restored, starting from a century-old suitcase to an ancient coffee machine, from a ravaged carousel horse to a large railway clock.

programme.title: The Pool Master
programme.desc: The Pool Master is a show presented by Anthony Archer-Wills, a top pool expert, landscape architect and artist. Team of professionals lead by him design and build amazing one-of-a-kind pools, which are in great demand among homeowners. After seeing masterpiece by Anthony, you will never agree to have a rectangle with water for swimming. Multipurpose pools for exercising and entertainment full of flowers, waterfalls, decorated with natural stone according to every taste and wallet will take your breath away.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: A documentary chronicling real life the adventures of one of the most deadliest professions in the world. Follow Alaskan crab fishermen as they face 40-foot waves and intense discomfort with freezing temperatures as they fish in the Bering sea. Sacrificing tooth and nail to catch the seasonal delicacies to later sell and trade on land. Witness the dangers these fisher men face as they battle against the sea, and experience how caution is a crucial part of staying alive.

programme.title: Garage Rehab
programme.desc: American petrol head and reality TV star, Richard Rawlings, famous for his show Fast N Loud, visits struggling garages and car workshops that are desperate for a helping hand. Alongside the team of world-class mechanics from his Gas Monkey Garage, Richard invests his precious time and money to get these toiling businesses back where they belong. The team visit workshops all over the USA, using their knowledge and experience to rev up the old girls and get their engines purring once more. With a serious amount of elbow grease on top of the help from Richards team, the owners have a shot once more at a successful business.

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: How Do They Do It? Ever wondered how the stripes get into toothpaste or how contact lenses are made? How do goods get from one country to another and then into our supermarkets? What are car tires made from and exactly why are plasma TV screens flat? Eating, drinking, driving, flying. These all are activities that we carry out with barely a second thought. But have you ever wondered what exactly goes into your teabag and how it got there? How does an airport handle hundreds of thousands of items of luggage each day? And just how can a cars airbag inflate so quickly? Every day – often without even realizing it – we come into contact with technology, be it in the bathroom, in the car or on the golf course. We take a look at how things work, and focus on some of the most amazing examples of everyday objects including the worlds fastest elevator and the most expensive chocolate money can buy.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered how things that surround us every day are produced? Find out about the whole process from the beginning to the end in a documentary television series How Its Made. The series demonstrates how various items like clothing and accessories, food, industrial products, cars, musical instruments and many more are manufactured. Who would have thought how exciting it would be to watch a cupcake, formula 1 race car or gummy vitamins being made?

programme.title: Misfit Garage
programme.desc: Misfit Garage is a reality TV show, a spin off from Fast N Loud. It features two of the mechanics fired from that shows Dallas, Texas-based Gas Monkey Garage, Tom Smith and Jordan Butler, as well as Thomas Weeks and Scot McMillan, who together start a new company, Fired Up Garage. The crew run into former co-workers of the shop they were all fired from by Richard Rawlings and who they later find out is their new shop landlord. It takes a lot of courage to face the problems from the past and deal with the challenging present, but this is exactly what the guys do.

programme.title: Dual Survival
programme.desc: Dave and Cody join forces, taking on a lost hiker scenario in the jungles of Laos. The items given to them include things a backpacker may carry: a camera, condoms and cigarettes.

programme.title: Survival instinct
programme.desc: Each week, a new pair of total strangers are faced with the ultimate survival challenge: survive for 21 days together with no clothes or supplies in some of the most dangerous environments in the world. In addition to the landscape itself working against the duo, the local wildlife stalk them as well. Of course, the biggest complication for any of the couples might end up being their own clashing egos. Will they make it out alive, or will they fall victim to the wilderness? They must fall back on their most primal instincts to ensure they dont become prey themselves.

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier
programme.desc: American reality series is about Alaskan pioneers Yule and Ruth Kilcher and their kids living together at their homestead. The Kilchers demonstrate one-of-a-kind model of surviving in severe conditions of the last frontier. Enjoy amazing panorama views of Alaska, showing its various nature. Sitting in a comfortable chair in your warm apartment just try to imagine how it really is when electricity and running water is not inevitable fact of life. The Kilchers hunt, go fishing, garden, gather, raise livestock in order to survive Alaskas uncontrollable power and wilderness.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: Classic Cars
programme.desc: Drew Pritchard and Paul Cowland travel across the United Kingdom to uncover classic cars to buy, restore and sell on for a profit. The pair scour garages, barns and facilities to discover collectible cars which include the likes of the Morris Minor Traveller, Jaguar XJS, Rover P6 and a BMW 635 CSI among many others. The combination of Drews expertise of negotiation and deal-making and Pauls extensive mechanical knowledge makes them a formidable team ready to tackle anything challenging that comes their way.

programme.title: Misfit Garage
programme.desc: Misfit Garage is a reality TV show, a spin off from Fast N Loud. It features two of the mechanics fired from that shows Dallas, Texas-based Gas Monkey Garage, Tom Smith and Jordan Butler, as well as Thomas Weeks and Scot McMillan, who together start a new company, Fired Up Garage. The crew run into former co-workers of the shop they were all fired from by Richard Rawlings and who they later find out is their new shop landlord. Of course, the biggest complication for any of the couples might end up being their own clashing egos. Will they make it out alive, or will they fall victim to the wilderness? They must fall back on their most primal instincts to ensure they dont become prey themselves.

programme.title: Dream Journey
programme.desc: February 2017 saw me embark upon a travel expedition through Scotland, Poland, France, Mexico, Belize and, (alas!), back. Not only was it the first time I ventured out to Central America, but also the first time I seriously pushed my bravery boundaries to do a whole lot of things Id never tried before. I defeated my life-long fear of scubadiving and skydiving, (the Carribbean vistas do help! - No danger Id do that again in Aberdeen), I went zip-lining over a Mexican jungle, I tried habanero-packed streetfood, (failed at that miserably), and organic tequila, (managed that better;), I climbed a Maya pyramid in the middle of a Belizean rainforest and fed hibiscus flowers to a very extravagant donkey. Most importantly, however, I got to know some incredible people - from shamans, wanderers and artists to refugees, businesswomen and expat cowboys. And thanks to aaaall of that, I also got to know a little bit more about myself for visiting the most remote corners of our planet reminds you how different and yet how similar we all are. Im looking forward to sharing my incredible experience in 5 exciting episodes of our travel series, which really turned out to be a Dream Journey:) I simply cannot wait for more!

programme.title: Race of Life
programme.desc: Predator versus prey: in this instalment we analyze three attack-escape scenarios involving bird predators and their prey. One is the climbing flight escape, another is horizontal speeding, and thirdly, there is turning and diving to avoid capture. Predator and prey attack-escape behaviour is another outcome of the evolutionary arms race. There is something about birds of prey that make us pay attention - maybe it is the inherent fear we all have that one will attack us - or perhaps it is just because they are seldom seen by most westerners. Regardless, birds of prey are fascinating and in this episode we examine of some of the largest, mightiest and most spectacular raptors from around the world. Well watch with fascination the Eagle, a large bird of prey that is a skilled hunter and highly efficient killer. These elegant predators do their best work in large open spaces, where they can fly high and see for miles and miles. Meanwhile, the fastest living animal on land, sea or sky is also a bird of prey. The peregrine falcon can be found from the arctic to the tropics, and for centuries has been a symbol of prestige. At the other end of the scale is a bird that strips a carcass t

programme.title: Race of Life
programme.desc: Predator versus prey: in this instalment we analyze three attack-escape scenarios involving bird predators and their prey. One is the climbing flight escape, another is horizontal speeding, and thirdly, there is turning and diving to avoid capture. Predator and prey attack-escape behaviour is another outcome of the evolutionary arms race. There is something about birds of prey that make us pay attention - maybe it is the inherent fear we all have that one will attack us - or perhaps it is just because they are seldom seen by most westerners. Regardless, birds of prey are fascinating and in this episode we examine of some of the largest, mightiest and most spectacular raptors from around the world. Well watch with fascination the Eagle, a large bird of prey that is a skilled hunter and highly efficient killer. These elegant predators do their best work in large open spaces, where they can fly high and see for miles and miles. Meanwhile, the fastest living animal on land, sea or sky is also a bird of prey. The peregrine falcon can be found from the arctic to the tropics, and for centuries has been a symbol of prestige. At the other end of the scale is a bird that strips a carcass to down to its skeleton in search of a meal. The presence of a vulture is often seen as a sign of impending doom. But its a case of whatever gets you through: the vulture too, is just trying to stay one step ahead, in the race of life.

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: On a hot summers day, nothing cools you down like a frozen fruity popsicle! Youll learn how an 11-year old boy created this sweet icy treat! And, have you ever noticed those colored spinning poles outside the barbershop? Youll be in stitches when you learn how they got their start! Plus, find out how a melting chocolate bar gave way to the invention of the microwave!

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: It was the PURRRFECT idea for making our furry friends more pleasant around the house! Youll learn how KITTY LITTER clawed its way into our homes. And youll learn how a garment made out of special woven fibers can stop a bullet, plus, why is walking under a ladder bad luck? And finally, well CUT TO THE CHASE and explain the history behind this common phrase!

programme.title: A Dogs Life
programme.desc: A Dogs Life explores the widely assumed facts that may actually be based on faulty and out-dated research. Ingenious experiments and meticulous observation reveal that the problems dogs solve best are those that involve interacting with humans. A fascinating and fun documentary that gives us a dogs eye view on the world.

programme.title: Life in the Blue
programme.desc: This films reveals the extraordinary variety of life found in the vast blue expanses of te open ocean. Here, all the action takes place in a 10 metre deep band of water, just under the surface. Many species use this section of water to migrate and hunt while others use ingenious ways to stay hidden where there appears to be no shelter. From the surface, the huge blue expanses of the open ocean appear to be devoid of all life. Popular belief is that most sea life congregates around mainline coasts, islands or rocky outcrops. But that perception is far from the truth. This 4K film,shot in the Atlantic, reveals the extraordinary diversity of species who call the open ocean their home and the tactics they use to survive in the watery wilderness. Most of the life here congregates in a nutrient-rich band of water, around 10 metres from the surface. But it is brutal life out in the open ocean. There is little shelter, big predators abound and food is hard to find. Only those who adapt to the conditions have a hope of surviving in the blue void. Barracuda are a common species in the open water and they travel in large spiraling groups close the surface as a defense mechanism against bigger predators. This space is also their own feeding ground and they can attack smaller fish en masse. And where there are barracuda, Blue sharks are never far away. These supreme open ocean predators are among the most graceful of sharks but when the need arises, they can transform instantly into ferocious and efficient killers. They regularly cross the Atlantic, coast to coast, in a journey of 4,000 kilometres. Other species profiled which also undertake huge journeys include turtles, pilot whales and whale sharks, and we reveal how the notorious Portuguese man o war provides shelter for small fish within its lethal tentacles. Other small fish of prey instinctively group together when they are threatened - as lone individuals they are far more likely to be eaten than large groups. But in dramatic close up action, a banquet is served as dolphins sprint in from the blue to harvest this massive source of protein. The film also reveals the amazing variety of life and colour found in shipwrecks. Like oases in the desert,these steel skeletons are colonized by soft and hard corals, attracting huge armies of small fish. They hide in the structures while larger fish and sharks roam the periphery.

programme.title: Creative Killers
programme.desc: Peppered across Africa are a few iconic locations that are renowned for killing action. Arenas bathed in a history of blood, places where Africas icons have hunted successfully for generations. Predators here develop unique and clever ways to hunt. But the circumstances arent the driving factor in this story. Sometimes these predators look for the perfect patch of ground to kill, a small area of long grass, or a single path that leads to the perfect ambush. How do they amplify their age-old skills by using the lie of the land? The fastest mammal on the planet, Cheetahs dont only use speed to kill. They use look out points to scan for weak prey and a baby fawn as lure to get its mother to come closer. Africas heavy weight the Lion is twice the weight and half the speed of the Cheetah. They need cover to hunt down their prey, so they stake out ambush points in Gullies, Marshland and Forest, lying in wait for their prey the wildebeest. We follow three characters through the Ndutu rainy season, starting with the arrival of the annual wildebeest migration, through to the wildebeest calves growing up and continuing their journey to the north-west. The film looks at how our characters use the environment and features of the landscape to their advantage. Reflecting on how they have learnt this from previous generations and will pass onto the next.

programme.title: Sarah Shark
programme.desc: Sarah travels to one of the top 10 dive destinations in Australia (Julian Rocks, Byron Bay, NSW) to dive with three species of Wobbegong Sharks within the Cape Byron Marine Park. She also conducts a street poll with members of the public to find out what they think about sharks.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Timber is one of this countrys biggest natural resources and the source of great potential wealth. Hence the existence of wholesale illegal logging, irrespective of the consequences to the local environment. This has led concerned parties to set up the Olancho Environmental Movement. This organization has mobilized to protect these forests, at some risk to its members, like Rene Gradiz, whose testimony is disturbing in the extreme.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: In this episode we explore Las Vegas lesser known past. We visit the National Atomic Testing museum to learn about how the desert outside of Vegas was used for testing Americas secret nuclear weapons. We also visit the Mormon Fort, the first permanent non-native settlement in the area, as well as the Neon Museum.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: South Africa has many different tribal groups and ethnic people, but none have a more fascinating story than the Zulu. These were once the most feared warriors in all of Africa and they have fiercely held onto that culture. Theyre also dedicated conservationists and we see first-hand the wildlife sanctuaries theyve created. This is a proud people with a unique history, and we get to share that with them.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: Host Bill Ball begins the ascent of the highest mountain in Africa. Trouble almost immediately affects the team as the cameraman suffers from fatigue and altitude sickness. Just over halfway, the trip is in serious doubt as altitude, cold and wind force the team to evaluate their fitness to continue.

programme.title: Everyday Elements
programme.desc: A series that puts chemistry in our everyday experience by showing the living connection we have with the chemicals and elements that make up our world. The matter that built skies and seas, the atoms that make up you and me, the chemistry around us that forms the things we touch, smell and see. This series shows us what the objects in our universe and in our homes are made from and why the particles around us behave as they do. Everything around us is built from Everyday Elements.

programme.title: Everyday Elements
programme.desc: A series that puts chemistry in our everyday experience by showing the living connection we have with the chemicals and elements that make up our world. The matter that built skies and seas, the atoms that make up you and me, the chemistry around us that forms the things we touch, smell and see. This series shows us what the objects in our universe and in our homes are made from and why the particles around us behave as they do. Everything around us is built from Everyday Elements.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: This country music Mecca has a plethora of American history to explore. Well stand on the stage of the Grand Ole Opry, visit the home of the 7th US President Andrew Jackson, and visit the largest recreation of the Parthenon outside of Greece.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Well find out why they called Minneapolis the "Mill City" when we visit the Mill City Museum. Then we march over to the Unions Fort Snelling, the first permanent structure in Minnesota, and then head underground and learn about St. Pauls organized crime hide outs.

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: It powers the machinery of nature; our weather, encourages and sustains life on land and at sea. When it sets in the West it reveals to us its many billions of sibling stars populating the night sky. We study our Sun closely, and like a Rosetta stone it can reveal the secrets of all the other stars above.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: As scientists and astronomers peer closer at nearby stars with ever more fidelity they are discovering planets; exo planets, worlds outside our own solar system. With technological advances and improved techniques scientists are discovering more and more worlds every day. With confidence scientists now calculated there could be as many as 40 billion Earth like planets in our Milky Way galaxy alone.

programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops
programme.desc: How is life on the citys roofs? This series scales new heights, exploring apartment buildings, towers and monuments to discover a world full of unsuspected treasures : our rooftops. By day and night, the population changes on these heights. There are people who work here, people who live here, and others who come here to relax. The worlds rooftops are a continual hive of activity…

programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops
programme.desc: How is life on the citys roofs? This series scales new heights, exploring apartment buildings, towers and monuments to discover a world full of unsuspected treasures : our rooftops. By day and night, the population changes on these heights. There are people who work here, people who live here, and others who come here to relax. The worlds rooftops are a continual hive of activity…

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: Learn the secrets behind THERMOS amazing technology! And they were the sweet candy pellets we loved as a kid, but did you know that PEZ was created to help people stop smoking? And find out how a steamboat inspired SAMUEL LANGHORNE CLEMENS to change his name to MARK TWAIN!

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: Its cheesy and and eaten all over the world! Youll learn how DOMINICKS PIZZA became DOMINOS PIZZA . And we all know how going to a circus wouldnt be complete without fluffy sweet COTTON CANDY! Well explain how this feathery goodness SPUN to life! And all the spy action heroes use them, but where did the term GADGET really come from?

programme.title: Water: H2O Stories
programme.desc: Water: H2O Stories is a 3x52 series revisiting the story of water on planet Earth and its disrupted course over time which has led to the 21st century biggest challenge.

programme.title: Blue Realm
programme.desc: Miracle Venom explores the strange, and often bizarre world of the oceans most venomous animals. Follow Dr. Glen Burns as he handles deadly Sea Snakes with only his bare hands. Youll be amazed at how a small Cone Snail hunts, paralyses and then eats its prey alive. The waters of Papua New Guinea and Australias Great Barrier Reef harbour an exceptional variety of venomous fish and invertebrates.The poisons of these animals are some of the most lethal known to man.They also, however, hold enormous potential in the development of therapeutic drugs.

programme.title: Blue Realm
programme.desc: Whale Sharks: Gentle Giants introduces us to this amazing creature through scientists who are racing against time to save the species. Utilizing space-age technology from NASA and the Hubble Telescope, researchers are able to identify, catalogue and track individual sharks. In Mexico and remote Western Australia, whale shark tourism has proven to be both a blessing and a curse, as more and more boats vie for fewer animals. The program also features the remarkable story of shark cowboys who captured and transported 4 live whale sharks (in customized jumbo jets) to the Georgia Aquarium in Atlanta.

programme.title: Inside Outer Space
programme.desc: Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see, how we can live in space and what science tells us about the past and the future as we journey inside out of space.

programme.title: Inside Outer Space
programme.desc: Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see, how we can live in space and what science tells us about the past and the future as we journey inside out of space.

Not only was it the first time I ventured out to Central America, but also the first time I seriously pushed my bravery boundaries to do a whole lot of things Id never tried before. I defeated my life-long fear of scubadiving and skydiving, (the Carribbean vistas do help! - No danger Id do that again in Aberdeen), I went zip-lining over a Mexican jungle, I tried habanero-packed streetfood, (failed at that miserably), and organic tequila, (managed that better;), I climbed a Maya pyramid in the middle of a Belizean rainforest and fed hibiscus flowers to a very extravagant donkey. Most importantly, however, I got to know some incredible people - from shamans, wanderers and artists to refugees, businesswomen and expat cowboys. And thanks to aaaall of that, I also got to know a little bit more about myself for visiting the most remote corners of our planet reminds you how different and yet how similar we all are. Im looking forward to sharing my incredible experience in 5 exciting episodes of our travel series, which really turned out to be a Dream Journey:) I simply cannot wait for more!

programme.title: Sarah Shark
programme.desc: Sarah travels to one of the top 10 dive destinations in Australia (Julian Rocks, Byron Bay, NSW) to dive with three species of Wobbegong Sharks within the Cape Byron Marine Park. She also conducts a street poll with members of the public to find out what they think about sharks.

programme.title: Sarah Shark
programme.desc: Sarah travels to one of the top 10 dive destinations in Australia (Julian Rocks, Byron Bay, NSW) to dive with three species of Wobbegong Sharks within the Cape Byron Marine Park. She also conducts a street poll with members of the public to find out what they think about sharks.

programme.title: Wild Australia with Ray Mears
programme.desc: Ray starts by hitching a lift on a research crane to get a birds eye view over the Rainforest; from there, he can see the geographical position responsible for this lush vegetation: mountain range in the west and the sea in the east. He then goes down to the ground, delving into the heart of the jungle, he comes across millennial trees, camouflage spiders and a miniature dinosaur, the Boyds Forest Dragon. He pursues his journey by travelling on a zipwire with wildlife expert, Justin McMahon. Together they observe life in the canopy. Meanwhile, Rays cameraman Martin Hayward Smith has been filming an animal that can only be found in this part of the world: the Bennetts tree kangaroo, a cute marsupial that lives like a monkey.

programme.title: Wild Australia with Ray Mears
programme.desc: Ray takes the Great Ocean Road along the Antarctic facing coast of Australia - the longest South facing coastline in the world. He starts in Port Philp Bay the entrance to Melbourne Harbour where for the first time he sees a strange marine creature - the weedy sea dragon - a relative of the sea horse. He also swims with a unique species of dolphin - the Burrunan Dolphins.Crossing the Bay he heads off down the longest War Memorial in the world - the Great Ocean Road and meets 93 year old Doug Stirling who remembers the world war 1 veterans building the road.Ray visits the Penguin Colony on Middle Island where guard dogs protect the penguins from foxes and he watches the night time return of the penguins after a day spent at sea fishing.He takes to the seas and discovers the creatures of the deep waters - albatross, balls of krill and a pod of fast moving common dolphins.

programme.title: Wild Australia with Ray Mears
programme.desc: In this episode, Ray explores the Red Centre of the country and shows that the Australian desert is filled with life for those who know where to find water.He arrives in the Red Centre by chopper as he flies over the Uluru monolith or Ayres Rock. For his first stop, he goes to a red kangaroo sanctuary where he cuddles a joey, meets their carer Brolga and gets close to the usually wary adult red kangaroos. He pursues his journey deeper in the desert to meet a local aboriginal Sammy Wilson. They go to a traditional waterhole and chat over a camp fire about Sammys ancestral knowledge of the land. Ray spends the night out under the stars before driving more inland to rocky areas where water collects. There Ray comes face to face with a wild kangaroo and rock wallabies. He then follows tracks along a dry river bed that lead him to Australias wild dog: a dingo.

programme.title: Animal Embassy
programme.desc: Hes known as the "Birdman of Loro Parque" and Rafa, the Loro Parque Foundation Scientific Director wears the badge with pride. Every day he surrounds himself with all things ornithological - from parrots and puffins to penguins. But its what hes carrying through the zoo that brings all the birds to the yard. Any guesses? Youve heard of the film "How to train your Dragon" - today Inaki has to try and train an anteater (and hes not sure whats proving easier)! With anteaters being the stubborn but sensitive types, Inakis digging deep into his bag of tricks - beginning with the old favourite, some vanilla yoghurt. Will Sue-Anne the anteater succumbs to Inakis tasty charms or will she thumb her (rather long) nose at him instead?

programme.title: Animal Embassy
programme.desc: Ubongo the gorilla has a massive cut on his foot. But how do you treat a 400-pound gorilla with a sore foot? Very carefully it seems. The Loro Parque veterinary team put all their skills to the test to tackle a problem with very, VERY big teeth. Youve heard of cattle farms and dairy farms - but what about a coral farm? Ester and her aquarium team take us behind the scenes of their newest attraction. But how will the public take to something thats not as cute and cuddly as their other exhibits? Have you ever seen a sloth take a shower? Not many people have. But when its summertime in Tenerife, the tourists arent the only ones looking to cool down. Hugo the sloth will draw back the shower curtain and reveal all...albeit verrrry slowly.

programme.title: Animal Doctors
programme.desc: Explore how animals developed over time and generations their own medicine and health care strategies. How have these been passed onto early humans ? Questioning traditional boundaries between human and animal, we will travel from Central African Republic, to Tanzania, from the US to France with the leading experts in animal behaviour. Todays science revisits the birth of animal intelligence and culture.

programme.title: Africas Deadliest
programme.desc: A national Geographic documentary looking into the deadliest animals that roam Africa. Examining animals that have evolved complex weapons from teeth to claws and agility so that they can protect themselves and battle effectively. From elephant tusks that can defend or attack to the fur, speed and agility of seals. Showing how these animals have exceptional skills and power alongside their body features that have developed into ideal tools for their needs.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: When visiting Tokyo, it does not take long to realize "youre not in Kansas anymore". The massive metropolis offer a feast for the senses: blinding neon, the bleeps and blips of Pachinko parlors, adventurous cuisine and music that is experimental, animated, and sometimes, just plain unusual. On this episode of Music Voyager we get a taste of the cultural umami that is Tokyo, and it is voyage of discovery filled with surprises you will never forget. From the outlandish fashion of J - Pop, the surprising pastime of a Japanese jazz giant, Tokyos rock guitar superstar and a humorous hip - hop freestyler, we meet the colorful characters that make Tokyo one of the worlds greatest cities. Our journey is powered by ample bowls of delicio us ramen noodles, first - class shots of sake and the occasional octopus ball.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Past Hunters
programme.desc: Built in 1861 Mill Street Barracks is steeped in rich history. It has accommodated many branches of the armed forces throughout its life. Like many other barracks it has also been used as a morgue making it a prime location for the supernatural.

programme.title: Past Hunters
programme.desc: Derek Acorahs The Past Hunters travel to Knutsford and investigate a former Crown Court. Multiple people have been sentenced to death and life in prison, but will the team encounter any of its former inmates tonight?

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Japanese Heights
programme.desc: There is more to Japans natural landscape than just Mount Fuji! Discover the countrys numerous mountains and the ethos of the people who live there. From mountains with eight peaks, mountain gods who keep locals in their awe to building snow monsters and embracing modern activities like skiing - this documentary shows the unseen side to Japan!

programme.title: Mongolia, Steppes Emirate
programme.desc: Battered by strong winds, and seen as a grazing land, Mongolia is the kingdom of steppes. With important mineral resources such as copper or uranium, coal and rare soil, Mongolia future is secure: the economy shows a significant growth rate and it is a business paradise for some expatriates. But for most of the population, needs remain unfulfilled.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Timber is one of this countrys biggest natural resources and the source of great potential wealth. Hence the existence of wholesale illegal logging, irrespective of the consequences to the local environment. This has led concerned parties to set up the Olancho Environmental Movement. This organization has mobilized to protect these forests, at some risk to its members, like Rene Gradiz, whose testimony is disturbing in the extreme.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Balto pārākuma dusmas mudina kādu jaunekli 2015. gadā Čārlstonā noslepkavot deviņus melnādainus baznīcas apmeklētājus. Tas motivē izraisīt sprādzienu un nogalināt musulmaņu bēgļus Kanzasā. Varas iestādes vēlas zināt, ar ko tas beigsies.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Politiskā kandidāta meita Peru pazūd pēc nakts dzīves Limā. Vīrietis, ar kuru viņa pēdējo reizi redzēta dzīva, ir saistīts ar jaunas amerikānietes pazušanu 3000 jūdžu attālumā. Kādas nelietīgas shēmas dalībnieks ir šis vīrietis?

programme.title: Pazudis
programme.desc: 38 gadus vecais Ēriks Lī Frenks no Mičiganas uz Ohaio pārcēlās 2013. gadā. Tur viņš satika savu pusaugu meitu, par kuru neko līdz tam nezināja. 6 mēnešus vēlāk viņa māte Mičiganā ziņoja par dēla pazušanu.

programme.title: Pazudis
programme.desc: Kad 15 gadus vecā Kaila Berga pēc naktsdzīves nav pārnākusi mājās, viņas mīļotie tic, ka viņa palikusi pie draugiem. Paiet sešas dienas, un atklājas, ka meitene pazudusi. Fakti par pazušanu raisa aizdomas nelielajā pilsētā.

programme.title: Pazudis
programme.desc: Randiņu nakts Filadeldijā izvēršas šausminoši - pāris ir pazudis. Ģimenes apvienojas, lai abus atrastu, bet, augot izmisumam, visi sāk rādīt viens uz otru ar pirkstiem. Drīz izmeklēšanu pārņem FIB, kas neļaujas spekulācijām.

programme.title: Duo Mix
programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Neredzamie briesmoņi: Sērijveida slepkavas Amerikā
programme.desc: 1978. gadā, pieaugot viņu pārliecībai, Bandijs, Geisijs, Dāmers, Ridžvejs un BTK - pazīstami arī kā "Piecinieks" - turpina kaķa un peles spēli ar likumsargājošajām iestādēm. Daži pat nonāk tik tālu, ka sejā izsmej policiju un plašsaziņas līdzekļus.

programme.title: Neredzamie briesmoņi: Sērijveida slepkavas Amerikā
programme.desc: Pēc gadiem ilgas izvairīšanās no notveršanas Geisijs un Bandijs beidzot tiek saukti pie atbildības - abi tiek pie soda par saviem briesmīgajiem noziegumiem. Tikmēr Ridžvejs jeb Grīnriveras slepkava joprojām ir brīvībā un kļūst aizvien lielāku draudu. Dāmers cenšas pretoties savām slepkavnieciskajām tieksmēm. Arī BTK ir klusējis, kamēr audzina ģimeni.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Kāda sieviete, kurai koledžā uzbrucis vīrietis, apņemas saukt viņu pie atbildības. Pēc trīsdesmit gadiem tās pašas universitātes students stāsta par sastapšanos ar pārsteidzošām līdzībām. Izmeklētāji atklāj šokējošu patiesību.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Jaunais kulta autors J.T. LeRoy strauji izaudzis par zvaigzni, un tas ir patiesi ievērojams sasniegums. Tomēr šķiet, jo vairāk grāmatu viņš pārdod, jo dīvaināka kļūst viņa uzvedība. Vai tas ir pārāk daudz slavas pārāk ātri, vai aizkulisēs notiek kaut kas aizsomīgs?

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Viņa ir modele. Playboy zaķis. Bet vai viņa arī ir slepkava? Daži sauc Lorensiju "Bambi" Bembeneku par perfekto TV slepkavu. Citi saka, ka viņa ir nevainīga. Divas Vanity Fair rakstnieces vēlas uzzināt - vai viņa tiešām nospieda gaili vai Bembijs tika uzmests?

programme.title: Pazudis
programme.desc: 19 gadus vecais Endžels Garsija pazudis pēc izbrauciena pa Hartfordu. Draugi saka, ka pirms notikuma Garsiju vajājis kāds noslēpumains apvidus auto. Pēc vairākiem mēnešiem 15 jūdzes no notikuma vietas varētu būt pamanīts Endžels.

programme.title: Pazudis
programme.desc: 35 gadus vecā māte Deanna Heistingsa atstāj zīmīti, ka devusies uz veikalu, bet tā arī nepārnāk. Izmeklētāji atklāj faktus par Deannas rīcību līdz viņas pazušanai. Atklājas neskaitāmas šausminošas teorijas.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: īstais CSI
programme.desc: Policija reaģē uz 999 izsaukumu, Koventrijā ir sadurts pusaudzis.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: īstais CSI
programme.desc: Daži draugi ir kopā, baudot dažus dzērienus, bet viens no viņiem tiek nogalināts, aizdomās turamais ātri arestēts.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: īstais CSI
programme.desc: Dudlijas policija izmeklē jauna vīrieša nāvi, kur, šķiet, tika izmantots liels ierocis, piemēram, mačete.

programme.title: Helter Skelter: Amerikāņu mīts
programme.desc: Mītisks rasu karš, slavas reibonis un narkotiku darījumi liek Čārlzam Mensonam cīnīties, lai saglabātu savu kultu. "Helter Skelter" atklāj, kā ar programmēšanas, narkotiku un vardarbības palīdzību viņš galu galā pārliecināja savus sekotājus nogalināt.

programme.title: Helter Skelter: Amerikāņu mīts
programme.desc: Izmisis Čārlzs Mensons kopā ar ģimeni aizbēg uz slēptuvi tuksnesī. Losandželosu pārņem bailes, un policija kavē izmeklēšanu. "Helter Skelter" atklāj, kā Mensons negaidīti palīdzēja izbeigt viņa terora valdīšanu.

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: Maiks Viljamss noslēpumaini pazūd savā kāzu gadadienā. Izskatās, ka viņu, iespējams, apēduši aligatori. Taču izskats var maldināt - lietas izmeklēšanā atklājas noslēpumi.

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: Kolorādo futbola mamma Peidža Birgfelda pazūd, un mazpilsēta ir satraukta. Policisti meklē pavedienus un šokējoši atklāj, ka šī uzticīgā māte dzīvo slepenu dubultdzīvi.

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: Veiksmīgs advokāts un mormoņu ģimenes cilvēks, piecu bērnu tēvs aukstasinīgi nošauts Walgreens autostāvvietā. Rūpīgāk ieskatoties, atklājas netīra uzņēmējdarbības vides afēra, kas pārauga bīstamā krievu ruletes spēlē.

programme.title: Pazudis
programme.desc: Ešlija Samersa ir jautra 14 gadus veca meitene. Kad viņa 4. jūlijā pazūd, viņas ģimene ir šokā. Mistērija kļūst plašāka - FIB viņas pazušanu saista ar vidām citām pazudušām sievietēm no apkārtnes. Desmit gadus vēlāk joprojām trūkst atbildes.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: īstais CSI
programme.desc: Sieviete ar mācīšanās grūtībām apsūdz strādnieku par nepiedienīgu izrādīšanos viņas dzīvoklī.

programme.title: Helter Skelter: Amerikāņu mīts
programme.desc: Čārlzs Mensons satiek pasauli, un mediji nespēj vien beigt tiražēt hipiju slepkavu kultu, ar ko noslēdzas 60. gadi. Kāpēc piecdesmit gadus vēlāk viņš joprojām piesaista mūsu uzmanību?

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: Tetovēšanas salona īpašnieks Deniss Ābrahamsens atrasts brutāli noslepkavots, kails uz masāžas galda savās mājās. Pierādījumi liecina par traku seksa ballīti, kas ar slavenu pieaugušo aktrisi beigusies nelāgi.

programme.title: Neredzamie briesmoņi: Sērijveida slepkavas Amerikā
programme.desc: Astoņdesmito gadu vidū divi no "Piecinieka" - Geisijs un Bandijs - sēž uz nāvessoda izpildes soliņa. Viņu slepkavnieciskās darbības beidzot ir ierobežotas. Tikmēr Grīnriveras slepkava ir prasījis 41 dzīvību, un, tā kā nav neviena aizdomās turamā, lietas darba grupa pieņem palīdzību no negaidīta avota - Teda Bandija. BTK nogalina savu kaimiņu. Desmit gadus pēc savas pirmās slepkavības Dāmers padodas savām fantāzijām un izdara līdz šim nežēlīgākos noziegumus.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Gubernatora palīdze pazūd bez vēsts. Viņas pazušana liek uzsākt izmeklēšanu, atklājot viena no štata ietekmīgākajiem cilvēkiem tumšos noslēpumus.

programme.title: Pazudis
programme.desc: Ešlija Samersa ir jautra 14 gadus veca meitene. Kad viņa 4. jūlijā pazūd, viņas ģimene ir šokā. Mistērija kļūst plašāka - FIB viņas pazušanu saista ar vidām citām pazudušām sievietēm no apkārtnes. Desmit gadus vēlāk joprojām trūkst atbildes.

programme.title: Duo Mix
programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Kailā pievilcība
programme.desc: Savdabīgs randiņu šovs, kurā cilvēki līdz ar mīlas peripetijām iepazīstas ar pakāpeniski atkalinātiem ķermeņiem. Pēcāk jāizģērbjas arī viņiem pašiem un jāizvēlas.

programme.title: Kailā pievilcība
programme.desc: Savdabīgs randiņu šovs, kurā cilvēki līdz ar mīlas peripetijām iepazīstas ar pakāpeniski atkalinātiem ķermeņiem. Pēcāk jāizģērbjas arī viņiem pašiem un jāizvēlas.

programme.title: Kailā pievilcība
programme.desc: Savdabīgs randiņu šovs, kurā cilvēki līdz ar mīlas peripetijām iepazīstas ar pakāpeniski atkalinātiem ķermeņiem. Pēcāk jāizģērbjas arī viņiem pašiem un jāizvēlas.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Maikls domā, ka Džordžam vecākajam ir pienācis laiks pamest bēniņus, kur viņš ir slēpies kā bēglis. Džordžs-Maikls palīdz savai draudzenei Annai sarīkot protestu pret filmas "Bīstamie brālēni" amerikāņu pārveidojumu. Tobiass iemīlas Kitijā un uzzina, ka viņa līgums ar "Blue Man Group" ir atcelts, un viņi lūdz Tobiasu ierasties Lasvegasā uz noklausīšanos.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Džordžs vecākais atklāj ko satriecošu — viņš sadarbojies ar britu sindikātu, kas viņu piemānījis uzcelt māju Irākā. Maikls nolemj pārbaudīt šo stāstu un dodas uz britu kvartālu Orindžas apgabalā, kur sastop noslēpumainu un skaistu sievieti vārdā Rita.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Džordžu senioru jaunais ģimenes advokāts Bobs Loblovs nosūta mājas arestā, un viņš ātri vien saprot, ka tas nav tik vienkārši izdarāms. Tikmēr Maikls sarunā pirmo randiņu ar Ritu, taču pirms tā Rita piedzīvo neveiksmīgu sastapšanos ar ģimeni.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Lai pierādītu Ritai savu vīrišķību, Maikls kopā ar brāļadēlu Stīvu Holtu piedalās ikgadējā baznīcas gadatirgus triatlonā. Džordžs vecākais mēģina pārmācīt jauniešus, bet Tobiass cenšas palīdzēt Džordža Maikla draudzenei Annai sagatavoties "iekšējā skaistuma" konkursam.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Als steidz pabeigt pagraba kāpņu labošanu, pirms televīzijā tiek parādīta viņa iecienītākā filma "Hondo". Mēģinot dabūt jaunas baterijas savam lukturītim, viņš tiek ieslēgts veikalā. Tikmēr Bads un Kellija mēģina nosvinēt Baka dzimšanas dienu.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Izmantojot savu nodokļu atmaksas naudu, Džefersons un Als sader par koledžas futbola spēli, kurā viņiem ir garantēta uzvara. Tiesa, tas ir pirms Trūmeina vērtīgais, ne pārāk spilgtais aizsargs Čads, kuru māca Bads, iemīlas Kellijā, kuru viņa apvārdo, novēršot no apmācības.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Kad Bandiju televizoram sabojājas kondensators, Als nolemj izmēģināt jaunu sporta spēļu šovu, cerot laimēt 10 tūstošus dolāru, lai iegādātos jaunu televizoru.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Als un Džefersoni nolemj gūt peļņu no 1970. gadu nostalģijas, pārdodot tā laika apavus.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Alam ir jāatjauno autovadītāja apliecība, un viņš ir apbēdināts, jo uzzinājis, ka viņa pārbaudītājs būs Bads.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Erls sastopas ar savu veco čomu Frenku, kurš atrodas cietumā par bankas aplaupīšanu - to, kurā Erlam un Rendijam bija jāpalīdz. Erls pēdējā brīdī palaida garām laupīšanu, jo iepriekšējā vakarā apprecējās ar Džoju.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Erls cenšas atkārtoti savest kopā Frenku ar savu draudzeni, kas no viņa izšķirās, bet viņam ir smagas pārdomas, jo nepamet sajūta, ka viņam bez viņas ir labāk. Tikmēr Katalīna saņem kompromitējošu Džojas fotoattēlu.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Erls cenšas atkārtoti savest kopā Frenku ar savu draudzeni, kas no viņa izšķirās, bet viņam ir smagas pārdomas, jo nepamet sajūta, ka viņam bez viņas ir labāk. Tikmēr Katalīna saņem kompromitējošu Džojas fotoattēlu.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Cietumā izbaudot TV laiku, Erls un Rendijs ir sajūsmā, ieraugot, ka Kamdenas apgabalā tiek filmēts šovs "Cops".

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Rendijs un ieslodzītie noskatās otro "Cops" sēriju, kurā redzams, kā Kamdenas apgabala policija reaģē uz virkni nekārtību pirmajā 4. jūlijā pēc 11. septembra.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Reimonds ir vienkāršs Amerikas pilsonis, viņš strādā par sporta žurnālistu un kopā ar savu burvīgo ģimeni dzīvo Longailendā. Reimonds dzīvi neuztver pārāk nopietni, viņš ar jokiem mēģina iziet no jebkuras dzīves situāciju, un visas rūpes par trim bērniem un sadzīvi labprāt uztic sievai Debrai. Debrai šāds vecmodīgs ģimenes modelis nav īsti pa prātam, tomēr Rejs spītīgi dod priekšroku sporta pārraidēm, nevis sarunām par laulības problēmām. Iespējams, ģimene sadzīvotu tīri labi, tomēr viņiem ir kaudze radinieku, kuri regulāri iegriežas ciemos, un visiem ir nodoklis par notiekošo. Tas, protams, nozīmē garantētus strīdus, nesaprašanās, pārpratumus un arī jautrību!

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Divi brāļi nevarētu būt dažādāk –: Čārlijam ir viss, ko dzīvē var vēlēties: nauda, skaista māja okeāna piekrastē, pavisam nedaudz darāmā un neskaitāmas draudzenes. Turpretī Alans ir īsts neveiksminieks – no viņa ir izšķīrusies sieva, kura ir paturējusi sev abu kopīgi iegādāto māju, un Alans nespēj savilkt kopā galus, lai samaksātu rēķinus. Tā kā Alanam nav pa kabatai atļauties savu mājokli, viņš lūdz Čārlijam atļauju padzīvot pie viņa kādu laiciņu, kamēr apradīs ar jauno situāciju un atradīs pats savu mājvietu. Viņi pat nenojauta, uz cik ilgu laiku tas ievilksies un cik daudz jautrības tas sagādās skatītājiem.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Maikls uzzina, ka cietumā sodu izcieš nevis viņa tēvs Džordžs, bet gan tēva dvīņubrālis Oskars. Pēc Berija sniegtās informācijas, viņš dodas uz Rino, lai atrastu īsto Džordžu, taču brauciena dēļ nākas atcelt solīto kempinga braucienu ar dēlu.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Džordžs vecākais atklāj ko satriecošu — viņš sadarbojies ar britu sindikātu, kas viņu piemānījis uzcelt māju Irākā. Maikls nolemj pārbaudīt šo stāstu un dodas uz britu kvartālu Orindžas apgabalā, kur sastop noslēpumainu un skaistu sievieti vārdā Rita.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Lai pierādītu Ritai savu vīrišķību, Maikls kopā ar brāļadēlu Stīvu Holtu piedalās ikgadējā baznīcas gadatirgus triatlonā. Džordžs vecākais mēģina pārmācīt jauniešus, bet Tobiass cenšas palīdzēt Džordža Maikla draudzenei Annai sagatavoties "iekšējā skaistuma" konkursam.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Ofisā, kura darbinieki nodarbojas ar papīra pārdošanu un piegādi, viss ir tāpat kā lielākajā daļā pasaules ofisu - tajā ir boss, tajā ir dažādi darbinieki, no kuriem dažs labs vien darbu tikai imitē, un starp visiem izveidojušās ofisa attiecības tādā kā piespiedu kārtā - labākas un arī ne tik labas. Kā jau ar kolēģiem. Ofisa vadītājs Maikls, kuru attēlo slavenais aktieris un komiķis Stīvs Karels, savus darbiniekus ik dienas cenšas iesaistīt savos izgudrotajos jokos un uzdevumos. Viņš pats domā, ka ir pasaules labākais boss, ko apliecina krūzīte ar uzrakstu - "Pasaules labākais boss". Diemžēl šo krūzīti viņš sev nopircis pats. Maikls cenšas būt draudzīgs pret saviem darbiniekiem, tomēr lielākā daļa viņa joku ir rasistiski, šovinistiski vai citādi aizskaroši.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Ofisā, kura darbinieki nodarbojas ar papīra pārdošanu un piegādi, viss ir tāpat kā lielākajā daļā pasaules ofisu - tajā ir boss, tajā ir dažādi darbinieki, no kuriem dažs labs vien darbu tikai imitē, un starp visiem izveidojušās ofisa attiecības tādā kā piespiedu kārtā - labākas un arī ne tik labas. programme.title: Kailā pievilcība
programme.desc: Savdabīgs randiņu šovs, kurā cilvēki līdz ar mīlas peripetijām iepazīstas ar pakāpeniski atkalinātiem ķermeņiem. Pēcāk jāizģērbjas arī viņiem pašiem un jāizvēlas.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Cietumā izbaudot TV laiku, Erls un Rendijs ir sajūsmā, ieraugot, ka Kamdenas apgabalā tiek filmēts šovs "Cops".

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Rendijs un ieslodzītie noskatās otro "Cops" sēriju, kurā redzams, kā Kamdenas apgabala policija reaģē uz virkni nekārtību pirmajā 4. jūlijā pēc 11. septembra.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Ofisā, kura darbinieki nodarbojas ar papīra pārdošanu un piegādi, viss ir tāpat kā lielākajā daļā pasaules ofisu - tajā ir boss, tajā ir dažādi darbinieki, no kuriem dažs labs vien darbu tikai imitē, un starp visiem izveidojušās ofisa attiecības tādā kā piespiedu kārtā - labākas un arī ne tik labas. Kā jau ar kolēģiem. Ofisa vadītājs Maikls, kuru attēlo slavenais aktieris un komiķis Stīvs Karels, savus darbiniekus ik dienas cenšas iesaistīt savos izgudrotajos jokos un uzdevumos. Viņš pats domā, ka ir pasaules labākais boss, ko apliecina krūzīte ar uzrakstu - "Pasaules labākais boss". Diemžēl šo krūzīti viņš sev nopircis pats. Maikls cenšas būt draudzīgs pret saviem darbiniekiem, tomēr lielākā daļa viņa joku ir rasistiski, šovinistiski vai citādi aizskaroši.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Džordžu senioru jaunais ģimenes advokāts Bobs Loblovs nosūta mājas arestā, un viņš ātri vien saprot, ka tas nav tik vienkārši izdarāms. Tikmēr Maikls sarunā pirmo randiņu ar Ritu, taču pirms tā Rita piedzīvo neveiksmīgu sastapšanos ar ģimeni.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Lai pierādītu Ritai savu vīrišķību, Maikls kopā ar brāļadēlu Stīvu Holtu piedalās ikgadējā baznīcas gadatirgus triatlonā. Džordžs vecākais mēģina pārmācīt jauniešus, bet Tobiass cenšas palīdzēt Džordža Maikla draudzenei Annai sagatavoties "iekšējā skaistuma" konkursam.

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Reimonds ir vienkāršs Amerikas pilsonis, viņš strādā par sporta žurnālistu un kopā ar savu burvīgo ģimeni dzīvo Longailendā. Reimonds dzīvi neuztver pārāk nopietni, viņš ar jokiem mēģina iziet no jebkuras dzīves situāciju, un visas rūpes par trim bērniem un sadzīvi labprāt uztic sievai Debrai. Debrai šāds vecmodīgs ģimenes modelis nav īsti pa prātam, tomēr Rejs spītīgi dod priekšroku sporta pārraidēm, nevis sarunām par laulības problēmām. Iespējams, ģimene sadzīvotu tīri labi, tomēr viņiem ir kaudze radinieku, kuri regulāri iegriežas ciemos, un visiem ir nodoklis par notiekošo. Tas, protams, nozīmē garantētus strīdus, nesaprašanās, pārpratumus un arī jautrību!

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Divi brāļi nevarētu būt dažādāk –: Čārlijam ir viss, ko dzīvē var vēlēties: nauda, skaista māja okeāna piekrastē, pavisam nedaudz darāmā un neskaitāmas draudzenes. Turpretī Alans ir īsts neveiksminieks – no viņa ir izšķīrusies sieva, kura ir paturējusi sev abu kopīgi iegādāto māju, un Alans nespēj savilkt kopā galus, lai samaksātu rēķinus. Tā kā Alanam nav pa kabatai atļauties savu mājokli, viņš lūdz Čārlijam atļauju padzīvot pie viņa kādu laiciņu, kamēr apradīs ar jauno situāciju un atradīs pats savu mājvietu. Viņi pat nenojauta, uz cik ilgu laiku tas ievilksies un cik daudz jautrības tas sagādās skatītājiem.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Als un Džefersoni nolemj gūt peļņu no 1970. gadu nostalģijas, pārdodot tā laika apavus.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Alam ir jāatjauno autovadītāja apliecība, un viņš ir apbēdināts, jo uzzinājis, ka viņa pārbaudītājs būs Bads.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Paredzēts, ka Erlam ir jāorganizē lekcija skolas bērniem, tomēr viņš sāk cīņu ar Rendiju par to, kurš kuru patiesībā aprūpē. Tikmēr Džoja mēģina mākslīgi veicināt dzemdības.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Erls un Rendijs pret savu gribu apvienojas, lai notvertu Frenku, kurš Rendija uzraudzībā aizbēga no cietuma furgona. Džoja un viņas māsa strīdās par to, kā piedzimt Džojas mazulim.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Ģimenes tikšanās ar japāņu investoriem izgāžas, kad Tobiass notur valdības aģentu par talantu aģentu. Džobam izdodas satuvināties ar tēvu, kurš kontrolē aizstājēju. Tikmēr Maikls vēlreiz satiek Ritas tēvoci, bet Meibijas romantiskā komēdija cieš pilnīgu fiasko.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Ģimenes tikšanās ar japāņu investoriem izgāžas, kad Tobiass notur valdības aģentu par talantu aģentu. Džobam izdodas satuvināties ar tēvu, kurš kontrolē aizstājēju. Tikmēr Maikls vēlreiz satiek Ritas tēvoci, bet Meibijas romantiskā komēdija cieš pilnīgu fiasko.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Dienu pirms Ice Hole alus reklāmas veidošanas Kellijai ir liela pumpa. Pega piedāvā risinājumu. Viņas tēvoča dzira to izārstēs. Als ir sajūsmā par dalību reklāmā. Mājas iepirkšanās tīkls viņam ir piedāvājis kompromisu - nebeidzamus The Three Stooges pirmā izdevuma sējumus, kas viņam arī ļoti patīk. Viņa patiesā problēma ir ar Mārsiju un viņas feministu grupu.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Bada intensīvās mācības, lai nokārtotu eksāmenu stipendijai, liek viņam periodiski nokratīt galvu un fantazēt par izdzīvošanu ar skaistām sievietēm. Vai kaislīga sastapšanās starp viņu un seksuāli agresīvo, 19 gadus veco brāļameitu Amberu, ir sapnis vai realitāte?

programme.title: Kailā pievilcība
programme.desc: Savdabīgs randiņu šovs, kurā cilvēki līdz ar mīlas peripetijām iepazīstas ar pakāpeniski atkalinātiem ķermeņiem. Pēcāk jāizģērbjas arī viņiem pašiem un jāizvēlas.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Divi brāļi nevarētu būt dažādāk –: Čārlijam ir viss, ko dzīvē var vēlēties: nauda, skaista māja okeāna piekrastē, pavisam nedaudz darāmā un neskaitāmas draudzenes. Turpretī Alans ir īsts neveiksminieks – no viņa ir izšķīrusies sieva, kura ir paturējusi sev abu kopīgi iegādāto māju, un Alans nespēj savilkt kopā galus, lai samaksātu rēķinus. Tā kā Alanam nav pa kabatai atļauties savu mājokli, viņš lūdz Čārlijam atļauju padzīvot pie viņa kādu laiciņu, kamēr apradīs ar jauno situāciju un atradīs pats savu mājvietu. Viņi pat nenojauta, uz cik ilgu laiku tas ievilksies un cik daudz jautrības tas sagādās skatītājiem.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Divi brāļi nevarētu būt dažādāk –: Čārlijam ir viss, ko dzīvē var vēlēties: nauda, skaista māja okeāna piekrastē, pavisam nedaudz darāmā un neskaitāmas draudzenes. Viņi pat nenojauta, uz cik ilgu laiku tas ievilksies un cik daudz jautrības tas sagādās skatītājiem.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Paredzēts, ka Erlam ir jāorganizē lekcija skolas bērniem, tomēr viņš sāk cīņu ar Rendiju par to, kurš kuru patiesībā aprūpē. Tikmēr Džoja mēģina mākslīgi veicināt dzemdības.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Erls un Rendijs pret savu gribu apvienojas, lai notvertu Frenku, kurš Rendija uzraudzībā aizbēga no cietuma furgona. Džoja un viņas māsa strīdās par to, kā piedzimt Džojas mazulim.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Ģimenes tikšanās ar japāņu investoriem izgāžas, kad Tobiass notur valdības aģentu par talantu aģentu. Džobam izdodas satuvināties ar tēvu, kurš kontrolē aizstājēju. Tikmēr Maikls vēlreiz satiek Ritas tēvoci, bet Meibijas romantiskā komēdija cieš pilnīgu fiasko.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Ģimenes tikšanās ar japāņu investoriem izgāžas, kad Tobiass notur valdības aģentu par talantu aģentu. Džobam izdodas satuvināties ar tēvu, kurš kontrolē aizstājēju. Tikmēr Maikls vēlreiz satiek Ritas tēvoci, bet Meibijas romantiskā komēdija cieš pilnīgu fiasko.

programme.title: Mesjē Speids
programme.desc: Speids meklē atbildes par noslēpumainu jaunu zēnu, kuru šķietami meklē pilnīgi visi. Samīrs paslēpj zēnu, un neviens nezina, ko īsti domāt par viņa uzrakstīto.

programme.title: Džeina Eira
programme.desc: Džeina atgriežas Tornfīldā pēc Misis Rīdas nāves, un Ročesters beidzot viņu bildina. Vai viņa piekritīs?

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Pulksten 4.50 no Pedingtonas Mis Mārplas draudzene Elspeta kļūst par liecinieci slepkavībai garāmbraucošā vilcienā. Mis Mārpla iefiltrē savu paziņu Lūsiju īpašumā, kur, viņasprāt, varētu atrasties līķis. Raterfordholā dzīvo Krekentorpu ģimene, kur jaunākā paaudze cīnās par tiesībām uz mantojumu. Lūsija, kas tur ierodas kā saimniecības vadītāja uz Ziemassvētku laiku, slepus iegūst informāciju un piespēlē to mis Mārplai.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Detektīvseriāls balstīts uz Agatas Kristi slavenajām kriminālromānu varones Mis Mārplas stāstiem. Džeina Mārpla ir klusa kundze cienījamā vecumā, viņa mierīgi un neuzkrītoši vada savas dienās nelielā ciematā Sentmerimīdā, un viņas novērošanas spēj, zināšanas par cilvēka dabu un dzīves pieredze padara viņu par izcilu detektīvi. Katrā sērijā Mis Mārpla ķeras pie jauna noslēpuma šķetināšanas: slepkavības, pazušanas gadījumi un sarežģīti psiholoģiski konflikti. Galvenajās lomās: Džeraldīna Makīvena, Saimons Kelovs, Džoanna Lamlija

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Viktorijas laikmeta Londonā skaistā un gudrā Elaiza Skārleta pēc tēva nāves pēkšņi attopas viena un bez naudas. Taču viņa nekrīt izmisumā un nolemj pārņemt tēva privātdetektīva aģentūru. Taču sievietei nav viegli izcīnīt savu vietu profesijā, kurā dominē vīrieši. Nereti viņai nākas izmeklējamās lietas zagt no tēva protežē, policijas inspektora Viljama Velingtona, galda. Lai arī Velingtonu kaitina Elaizas vēlme strādāt par privātdetektīvi, ar laiku viņš sāk novērtēt viņas prasmes un aso prātu. Elaiza un Velingtons nepārtraukti ķildojas, taču patiesībā viņu vidū virmo dziļas jūtas, un viņiem nāksies kopīgi izmeklēt arī kādu sarežģītu ar Elaizas tēvu saistītu noslēpumu.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Viktorijas laikmeta Londonā skaistā un gudrā Elaiza Skārleta pēc tēva nāves pēkšņi attopas viena un bez naudas. Taču viņa nekrīt izmisumā un nolemj pārņemt tēva privātdetektīva aģentūru. Taču sievietei nav viegli izcīnīt savu vietu profesijā, kurā dominē vīrieši. Elaiza un Velingtons nepārtraukti ķildojas, taču patiesībā viņu vidū virmo dziļas jūtas, un viņiem nāksies kopīgi izmeklēt arī kādu sarežģītu ar Elaizas tēvu saistītu noslēpumu.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Helēna un Džeimss tur noslēpumā savus jaunumus par gaidāmo bērnu. Jaunajiem fermeriem Krebtrijiem ganāmpulkā izcēlusies ļoti bīstama un lipīga slimība. Džeimss vēlas palīdzēt kā vien var, un arī Helēna piesakās par palīgu. Vēlāk izrādās, ka tas nebija prātīgi darīts, jo apdraudēta Helēnas veselība. Tomēr viņa sapulcina vietējos lauksaimniekus, lai palīdzētu Krebtrijiem. Kārmodijs iepazīstas ar bruņurupuci Bernardu un viņa saimnieku Nedu Klafu. Zigfrīds apmāca Kārmodiju, lai viņš spētu labāk strādāt ar klientiem. Zigfrīds atņem Kārmodijam visas mācību grāmatas, bet vēlāk izrādās, ka tās ļoti noder. Holas kundze saņem vēstuli, ka šķiršanās lieta veiksmīgi rit uz priekšu. Viņa stāv izvēles priekšā – vai to kādam pavēstīt vai ne.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Karš turpinās, un Džeimss gatavojas tam, ka viņu var iesaukt armijā, tāpēc ļoti vēlas, lai vetārstu praksē valdītu kārtība un lai Kārmodijs tiktu pienācīgi apmācīts. Džeimss dusmojas, ka Kārmodijs nespēj iemācīties vadīt auto, turklāt aizņemtības dēļ viņš gandrīz nekad nepavada laiku ar Helēnu. Pamfrijas kundzei rodas tūlītēja nepatika pret Kārmodiju, jo viņš neuztver dzīvniekus kā cilvēkus. Pamfrija nolemj, ka Džeimsa prombūtnes gadījumā vērsīsies tikai pie Zigfrīda. Tomēr abus oponentus satuvina pavisam negaidīta iespēja pavizināties ar mašīnu. Holas kundze ir dilemmas priekšā, jo Džeralds paziņo, ka dosies prom pie savas māsas. Taču, vērojot kā Džeimss un Helēna raugās nākotnē, Holas kundzei rodas ideja par savu iespēju dzīvē.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Seriāla darbība notiek 19. gs. 90. gados. Viljams Mērdoks, kurš aizrautīgi seko līdzi jaunākajiem zinātnes sasniegumiem un bieži izmanto šīs zināšanas arī savā darbā, risina dažādus noziegumus.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Karls Albergs pārceļas uz klusu piekrastes pilsētiņu, jo ir noguris no policijas darba lielpilsētā. Tomēr viņam nākas izmantot visas prasmes, lai izmeklētu slepkavības, kas arvien turpina notikt.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Kad kāds vīrs bez pases un saiknes ar Mārlovu tiek atrasts miris uz lauku ceļa, Džūdita, Beka un Sjūzija pēta noslēpumus un spriedzi, kas valda starp vietējiem iedzīvotājiem.

programme.title: Komisārs Megrē
programme.desc: Komisārs Megrē atgriežas pie saviem skatītājiem, lai risinātu mīklainas slepkavības Parīzes nakts aizsegā. Megrē atveido populārais britu komēdiju aktieris un slavenais "Misters Bīns" Rovans Atkinsons. Otrajā sezonā iekļautas divas sērijas, kas uzņemtas pēc Žorža Simenona romānu motīviem.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Džeimss ir devies dienēt armijā, un Helēna jūtas lieka Skeldeilā. Kad viņas tēvam Ričardam vajadzīga palīdzība, viņa atgriežas mājās. Stingri glabāts ģimenes noslēpums apdraud abu attiecības, kad Ričards atsakās ļaut Helēnai strādāt fermā Tā kā Skeldeilā palikusi tikai Holas kundze un Zigfrīds, viņa aptver, ka, aizbraucot līdzi Džeraldam, Zigfrīds paliks pavisam viens. Tomēr Holas kundze ir pieņēmusi lēmumu, ka brauks prom. Drīz vien gan Helēna, gan Holas kundze uzzinās, kur ir viņu īstās mājas.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Pienākuši Ziemassvētki. Džeimss ir jūdzēm tālu gaisa spēku treniņu bāzē. Pēc emocionālas telefona sarunas ar Helēnu, kurai jau drīz piedzims bērns, Džeimss apņemas aizbraukt mājās, bet viņam ir maz iespēju to īstenot. Turklāt gaisa spēku talismans, piekūns Džordžija, ir steidzami jāārstē, lai karavīri nesāktu ticēt ļaunai zīmei. Džeimss nespēj izlemt, ko darīt. Vai viņš paspēs nokļūt mājās uz Ziemassvētkiem? Pa to laiku Holas kundze gatavo Ziemassvētku mielastu, kamēr Zigfrīds un Kārmodijs strīdas par to, kurš šogad tēlos Ziemassvētku vecīti. Kārmodijs jūtas gaidīts Derovbijā un atklāj, ka viņam patīk svinēt svētkus. Džeimss apgūst ļoti svarīgu mācību, un viņu par to atalgo ar pārsteigumu.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Viktorijas laikmeta Londonā skaistā un gudrā Elaiza Skārleta pēc tēva nāves pēkšņi attopas viena un bez naudas. Taču viņa nekrīt izmisumā un nolemj pārņemt tēva privātdetektīva aģentūru. Taču sievietei nav viegli izcīnīt savu vietu profesijā, kurā dominē vīrieši.
