programme.title: Airport Security: Brazil
programme.desc: Federal Police at Sao Paulo International Airport work 24-7 to stop illegal activity. Their main threat, cocaine smuggling. Agents arrest two different carriers on a flight to Ethiopia. One has cocaine in shampoo bottles; the other, in fabric dye containers. Intel flags a man heading to Hong Kong. He has capsules taped to his body - and possibly other places as well. A woman has two empty backpacks in her suitcase, and both hide cocaine.

programme.title: Tsunami: Race Against Time
programme.desc: A massive earthquake in the Indian Ocean sets off a tsunami that, within minutes, arrives in the bustling city of Aceh, causing unprecedented havoc and devastation. This film follows the desperate struggle to survive of city-dwellers in Indonesia and tourists in Thailand caught in the unfolding catastrophe, as well as the scientists working against the clock to warn the world.

programme.title: Tsunami: Race Against Time
programme.desc: After a massive earthquake triggered the deadliest tsunami in recorded history, multiple waves hit Thailand. As the beaches of popular resorts are pummeled by unstoppable torrents of water, locals and tourists work together to save lives. In the chaotic aftermath, survivors separated by the waves desperately search for their loved ones.

programme.title: Seconds from Disaster
programme.desc: When a Boeing 747 crashes into a remote mountain-side 45 minutes after take off in 1985, investigators are left baffled. This is the deadliest single-aircraft accident in aviation history, with 520 passengers and crew left dead. Was the crash due to a bomb on board, or could something be flawed in the very structure of all 747s? Why did these innocent people lose their lives in such a shocking and brutal way? We watch as the team unravel the mystery of flight JAL123 and examine the evidence piece by piece; as they climb to the horrific crash site and uncover a devastating truth

programme.title: Seconds from Disaster
programme.desc: On 3rd October 1993, US soldiers from the elite units of the U.S. Armys Rangers and Delta Force stormed a building near the in Mogadishu, Somalia, to capture key lieutenants in warlord Mohamed Farrah Aidids clan. What should have been a simple snatch and grab operation lasting under an hour, turned into a day and night battle that resulted in the deaths of 18 Rangers and an estimated 500 to 1,000 Somali civilians.

programme.title: Seconds from Disaster
programme.desc: The series investigates historically relevant human-made and natural disasters from the last century. Each episode is dedicated to a particular gruesome accident, every minute of which is thoroughly analyzed and studied in order to present the reasons for its occurrence and circumstances of it. The program uses re-enactments, interviews with witnesses and survivors, and CGI to show the viewers how it happened in reality. All this is done to draw viewers attention to these issues so that we make sure they wont happen again in the future.

programme.title: Notre Dame: Race Against the Inferno
programme.desc: On 15th April 2019, during Holy Monday Mass, the worlds most famous cathedral caught fire. Notre-Dame de Paris was ablaze in minutes, as an epic battle unfolded for heroic French firefighters. Under the gaze of the worlds media, they fought the inferno for more than 15 hours. Exclusive footage and interviews bring vividly to life the moment-by-moment courage of the Paris fire and police services, as they put their lives on the line to save this historic building.

programme.title: Hindenburg: The New Evidence
programme.desc: Shot by amateur photographer Harold Schenck and never seen by government investigators in 1937, Hindenburg has remained essentially unknown until recently. The stunning footage of the Hindenburgs final moment starts earlier than in the other famous newsreel films - and it was shot from an entirely new angle that shows the entire length and breadth of the eight-hundred-foot-long airship. Its also the only known footage of the Hindenburg in the air before it crashes in flames. A team of crash investigators, historians, and scientists has come together to reexamine the case of the airship Hindenburg with the new film evidence in hand.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Expedition Mars
programme.desc: EXPEDITION MARS brings to life one of the greatest sagas of the Space Age - the epic struggle to get the Spirit and Opportunity rovers safely to Mars, and their astounding journeys of exploration once they finally got there. When they landed on Mars in January 2004, they were expected to last at least ninety days, but not much more. The solar powered robots would almost certainly freeze to death if they lasted long enough to see their first Martian winter, or even sooner if dust coated their solar panels and robbed them of energy. Instead, Spirit lasted six years, and Opportunity is still rolling almost thirteen years later. Their unprecedented record of discovery, longevity, and resilience opened the Martian frontier for good and launched the modern age of Mars exploration. Largely forgotten now is the fact that the mission began as a last ditch effort to prove that NASA could still handle Mars after a string of embarrassing failures in the 1990s. The engineering challenge of building and delivering these two robot geologists safely to Mars was a nerve-wracking ordeal that flirted with disaster from the very beginning to the final seconds of countdown when they were launched from Cape Canaveral. On Mars the rovers continued beating the odds, cheating death many times as they turned their modest three-month mission into the first great overland expeditions on another planet. EXPEDITION MARS brings all the drama to life with never before seen footage from the archives of the Jet Propulsion Laboratory, first person recollections by mission scientists and engineers, and vivid, realistic animation of the rovers in the actual terrain they explored on Mars

programme.title: Amsterdam Central 24/7
programme.desc: Follow the dedicated teams working tirelessly 24/7 at Amsterdam Central Station, where managing over 1,500 trains and 180,000 passengers daily is no easy feat—especially during Pride Day. When a train loses power, its a race against time for traffic control and emergency responders. Adding to the challenge, the station is undergoing the largest renovation in its history, all while keeping to a full schedule.

programme.title: Amsterdam Central 24/7
programme.desc: The station is undergoing an impressive transformation, with the old railway bridge being replaced by a gigantic steel structure. Superintendent Leon faces a huge challenge in this complex operation. Security and Services staff accompany two undocumented migrants to the Asylum Seekers Application Centre, while Gusta helps travelers recover lost property in the Lost and Found department.

programme.title: Inside Melbourne Airport
programme.desc: A Bali-bound flight faces delays after a service truck crashes into its undercarriage. Australian Border Force find illegal weapons in a passengers luggage. Unregistered taxi drivers are caught in the act and theres a fuel leak on the tarmac. At night, a mysterious Soviet-era plane lands unannounced.

programme.title: Inside Airport: Lost and Found
programme.desc: Airport workers reunite travelers with their missing items, including a sentimental 40th-anniversary gift and a wallet brimming with $1,500 in cash. A man breaks into a song of gratitude when his two laptops are returned to him. Agents in Denver discover a bag packed with rotting fish and put on their detective hats to hunt for the owner of a jewelry box full of treasures.

programme.title: Toronto Airport Uncovered
programme.desc: As thunder rumbles and rain pours, maintenance teams carry out urgent post winter repairs, but lightning forces them inside. A hardworking ground support engineer struggles to keep flights on time in the worsening rain. Repairs on a faulty 787 go to the wire. A ramp team has an hour to re-load an entire planes cargo, and two dogs receive special treatment enroute to their loved ones.

programme.title: Engineering Europe
programme.desc: Dive into the awe-inspiring world of Dutch engineering, where human ingenuity meets the relentless power of nature. From a remarkable sideways ship launch, to the nations largest flood barrier, each stop reveals a story of engineering innovation. Then, step back in time to uncover the ingenious, water management secrets hidden within the iconic windmills of Kinderdijk.

programme.title: Engineering Europe
programme.desc: Embark on a thrilling journey through Germanys greatest feats of engineering. From the awe-inspiring technology thats allowing engineers to build rail lines 40m below Munich city centre, to the secrets of a record breaking swing bridge across the river Ems. Marvel at twin ship lifts that carry cargo vessels 40m in the air and step back in time to visit restoration work at the worlds tallest church.

programme.title: Top Guns: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The students face their final test in an iconic head-to-head dogfight against their instructors. To pass, they must bring all the skills they have learned during their advanced phase training. With graduation just days away, students start to worry about their final grades and whether they will get the posting they—and in many cases, their families—want.

programme.title: Top Guns: The Next Generation
programme.desc: In the high-octane competitive world of the U.S. Navys toughest fighter pilot school, only the strong succeed. This world exclusive takes the viewer inside the final grueling six months of training and selection, where the students learn how to fly combat missions. Dreams of earning strike pilot wings collide with the harsh reality of the most rigorous tests yet. We are inside the cockpit as they tackle adrenaline-fueled, dynamic aerial tests, each designed to push the students to their limits and beyond and not all will pass the test.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis and all the evidence. Why did Deepwater Horizon explode causing the worst manmade oil spill in history? Why did the Air France Concorde crash barely a minute after take off? How did so many people die in an Austrian funicular trip up the inside of a mountain at Kaprun?

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis and all the evidence. Why did Apollo 13 really explode 200,000 miles from Earth? What caused the devastating fire that swept through the MGM Grand in Las Vegas? Why could the world famous Ponte Morandi bridge in Italy simply collapse and kill 43 people?

programme.title: Witness: Disaster in Japan
programme.desc: On March 11, 2011, a 9.0 magnitude earthquake struck 75 miles off the eastern coast of Japan. Almost immediately, tsunami warnings blared, urging residents along Japans coast to quickly move to higher ground. For the next several hours, residents watched in stunned horror as a series of massive waves slammed into the coast, inundating entire towns and sweeping across the countryside, laying waste to everything in its path. Throughout, amateur videographers, news crews, government agencies, tourists, and countless others were recording the sights and sounds of the unfolding catastrophe. Weaving together their footage, Witness: Japans Disaster reconstructs the earthquake and tsunami as they happened, entirely through the eyes of those who experienced them.

programme.title: Real Time Disaster
programme.desc: At 9:20am on the 15th of February 2013, in the Siberian city of Chelyabinsk something, not of this world was spotted blazing its way through the morning skies. In this episode we tell the story of the 2013 Chelyabinsk Meteorite strike through the incredible footage of the event, captured by those who actually witnessed it. Well use this remarkable amateur video to unpack the science and explore where the meteorite came from, its violent end and how it unleashed a force equivalent to thirty Hiroshima bombs on the unsuspecting Russian city.

programme.title: Seconds from Disaster
programme.desc: The series investigates historically relevant human-made and natural disasters from the last century. Each episode is dedicated to a particular gruesome accident, every minute of which is thoroughly analyzed and studied in order to present the reasons for its occurrence and circumstances of it. The program uses re-enactments, interviews with witnesses and survivors, and CGI to show the viewers how it happened in reality. All this is done to draw viewers attention to these issues so that we make sure they wont happen again in the future.

programme.title: Seconds from Disaster
programme.desc: In the golden age of ocean liners, one ship has been built to outpace and outshine them all: the Titanic. Billed as the "Unsinkable" ship, the Titanic is a mechanical marvel, a combination of innovative and luxurious design. However, just days after its voyage begins, the Titanic meets a catastrophic end, becoming one of the biggest shipping disasters of all time. On 14 April, 1912 at 11:40 PM, the Titanic grazes an iceberg, which causes the ship to sink, taking with it the lives of more than 1,500 people. Officials have struggled for decades to sift through the theories and conspiracy speculations to figure out what sank the massive ship. Using a groundbreaking experiment that mimics the conditions of the Titanic as it scraped the iceberg, experts find new evidence that enables them to finally conclude what brought the "unsinkable" ship down in the middle of the icy Atlantic. Titanic includes haunting commentary of eye-witness accounts, CGI and cutting-edge experiments that help bring the Titanic back to life to retrace its final moments.

programme.title: Pole to Pole with Will Smith
programme.desc: Will struggles in bone-chilling winds in the South Pole, where temperatures can drop below -100°F. He skis, treks and climbs across giant icefields and cliffs with the support of one of the worlds best polar athletes, Richard Parks. In one of the planets most isolated research stations, scientists take ice cores deep under the surface and make incredible sacrifices to pursue their research.

programme.title: Pole to Pole with Will Smith
programme.desc: Will travels to the kingdom of Bhutan on a deeply intimate journey in search of the secret to happiness. Guided by happiness expert professor Dacher Keltner and local writer Tshering Denkar, Will treks to one of the highest and happiest villages in the Himalayas, at 13,000-foot altitude. While there, he confronts some of the most challenging moments of his extraordinary life and career.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded
programme.desc: This series will go back through the record to explore life-altering, earth-shattering, unforgettable events using a combination of carefully selected archive, cutting edge CGI and informative scripting in this popular science format. As well as exploring spectacular archive, illustrating the full toll these disasters can take, well dig into the science behind each event, shining a light on the most fascinating elements and giving an understanding on how and why these events occur.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded
programme.desc: This series will go back through the record to explore life-altering, earth-shattering, unforgettable events using a combination of carefully selected archive, cutting edge CGI and informative scripting in this popular science format. As well as exploring spectacular archive, illustrating the full toll these disasters can take, well dig into the science behind each event, shining a light on the most fascinating elements and giving an understanding on how and why these events occur.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: Episode one begins on an unremarkable Dutch canal. What we see unfold, however, is anything but. Its one of the most dramatic construction catastrophes in recent history: a double telescopic crane collapse, a barge capsizing and a 187-ton bridge span all careening into a quiet residential neighbourhood resulting in the total destruction of dozens of homes. The reason? A combination of wind, lack of balance and crane operator error. From there, we travel to Asia, where some of the worlds biggest construction sites fail before construction even begins. We witness a variety of construction site collapses: massive holes in the ground that implode in dramatic fashion, hurling retaining walls, roads and equipment dozens of metres below into a pit. Substandard soil conditions and reclaimed land seem to be the biggest reasons for these fails.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: Episode two begins with the horrific fire at Notre Dame Cathedral in the spring of 2019. Multiple eye- witnesses captured the raging flames on their phone cameras, but what they couldnt capture was the frantic, behind-the-scenes confusion and infrastructure fail that contributed to making the fire much more devastating than it should have been. We take viewers behind the scenes. Next, we take a take a look at scaffolding, an integral piece of construction equipment. When it fails, the results can be catastrophic. But why does it fail? We examine the reasons through multiple examples.

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis and all the evidence. How did a train crash at Lac Megantic send 200 ft fireballs into the night sky and destroy half a town? Why did a sugar factory explode in Georgia killing 14? How did the Ever Given become do firmly wedged across the Suez canal that it cost $60bn?

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically dissected, analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis using all the evidence. Why did Fukushimas nuclear plant meltdown and explode after a massive earthquake? How did a 200ft tall tower crane collapse onto the Manhattan streets? Why did the USS Forrestal, Americas flagship aircraft carrier, explode killing 134 crew?

programme.title: Inside Airport: Lost and Found
programme.desc: Airport workers reunite travelers with their missing items, including a sentimental 40th-anniversary gift and a wallet brimming with $1,500 in cash. A man breaks into a song of gratitude when his two laptops are returned to him. Agents in Denver discover a bag packed with rotting fish and put on their detective hats to hunt for the owner of a jewelry box full of treasures.

programme.title: Inside Melbourne Airport
programme.desc: A Bali-bound flight faces delays after a service truck crashes into its undercarriage. Australian Border Force find illegal weapons in a passengers luggage. Unregistered taxi drivers are caught in the act and theres a fuel leak on the tarmac. At night, a mysterious Soviet-era plane lands unannounced.

programme.title: Inside Sydney Airport
programme.desc: With all the emergency agencies involved in a simulated plane crash exercise, real problems place airport operations in jeopardy. Dangerous winds close 2 runways, followed by an electrical outage that blanks flight information boards. The worst case scenario becomes a real prospect when the alarm is raised from an explosion inside a passenger terminal.

programme.title: Toronto Airport Uncovered
programme.desc: As thunder rumbles and rain pours, maintenance teams carry out urgent post winter repairs, but lightning forces them inside. A hardworking ground support engineer struggles to keep flights on time in the worsening rain. Repairs on a faulty 787 go to the wire. A ramp team has an hour to re-load an entire planes cargo, and two dogs receive special treatment enroute to their loved ones.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Food Factory USA
programme.desc: On this episode of Food Factory USA: Del Monte canned green beans are always picked and packed on the same day, for maximum freshness; it takes a state-of-the-art facility to produce perfect farfalle pasta by the ton; and discover the unique iced tea thats infused with the calming spirit of reggae.

programme.title: Food Factory USA
programme.desc: On this episode of Food Factory USA: Get the skinny on White Castles cheesecake on a stick; find out what it takes to make a 5,000-pound monster cheese wheel; and these irresistible blondies are shipped to snack-lovers across the country.

programme.title: Food Factory USA
programme.desc: On this episode of Food Factory USA: This Pennsylvania bakery makes 600 million donuts a year; a team of workers is behind every picture-perfect pepperoni roll; and these Korean multigrain snacks are hand-dipped in chocolate.

programme.title: Food Factory USA
programme.desc: On this episode of Food Factory USA: Herrs kettle cooked potato chips are lovingly sliced and fried to perfection; in Brian, Ohio, 2.5 billion Dum-Dums Original Pops are produced every year; and, it takes tons of flour, food coloring, and a top-secret recipe to turn out 5.7 million Joy Cones ice cream cones every day.

programme.title: Curiosity: Life of a Mars Rover
programme.desc: New interviews, graphics, and animation will revamp the 2012 special "Martian Mega Rover" which follows the two rovers operating on Mars -- Opportunity, still rolling on Mars since 2004, and Curiosity, who landed in 2012. All the excitement about manned missions to Mars twenty years from now can be traced back to these two pioneering explorers, the only emissaries we have on the surface of Mars at the moment. Their discoveries and the vivid images they send home are a continuing source of inspiration, and the reason why we want to go back.

programme.title: Ultimate Space Telescope
programme.desc: Thanks to the James Webb Space Telescope, astronomys biggest mysteries are finally getting answered. The worlds most complex and innovative telescope is peering into corners of the cosmos never before seen. Witness the decades long journey it took just to get off the ground, and meet the team capturing some of the greatest space images in human history.

programme.title: Engineering Connections
programme.desc: Richard Hammond unpicks the engineering DNA of the mighty aircraft carrier HMS Illustrious. A potent force with a powerful punch, this aircraft carrier can deliver a strike force anywhere on the globe at any time. Its a floating airport, city and battleship all rolled into one. But what connects this indomitable vessel with a boomerang, a hearing aid, a 19th century seed drill, Tower Bridge and the space race?

programme.title: Engineering Connections
programme.desc: Richard Hammond visits a building described as the "greatest of our time" - the Guggenheim Museum, Bilbao, Spain - to find out which Engineering Connections made this iconic building possible. He finds out how visionary architect transformed a decaying city into a vibrant tourist hub with his futuristic building. But it would not have been possible without a volcano, an egg, Sir Walter Raleigh, a surveyors trundle wheel and a Cold War Russian submarine.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: Even during a pandemic, smuggling never stops. After adjusting tactics in the early days of the COVID crisis to meet the increasing flow of narcotics coming across our southern land borders, the Department of Homeland Security is now pivoting back to our nations airports where international travel is starting to rev back up again. Whether narco-traffickers try to slip through an airport, seaport or land crossing, vigilant officers are on high-alert to stem the flow of illegal contraband. Using every tool available to them, DHS will stop at nothing to catch a smuggler.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: Even during a pandemic, smuggling never stops. After adjusting tactics in the early days of the COVID crisis to meet the increasing flow of narcotics coming across our southern land borders, the Department of Homeland Security is now pivoting back to our nations airports where international travel is starting to rev back up again. Whether narco-traffickers try to slip through an airport, seaport or land crossing, vigilant officers are on high-alert to stem the flow of illegal contraband. Using every tool available to them, DHS will stop at nothing to catch a smuggler.

programme.title: Chasing the Equinox
programme.desc: The ancients hid the secrets of their incredible knowledge of astronomy in their temples and palaces, built to align with the sun, on the same day, all over the world. Revealing our species obsession with the sun, across thousands of years and every continent, this is architectural magic on a cosmic scale.

programme.title: Greatest Treasures of the Ancient World
programme.desc: Professor Bettany Hughes returns to explore the extraordinary and captivating mummies of Ancient Egypt. Egypt has a history like no other: nestling between the desert and the Nile, its extraordinary pyramids, soaring temples, and hidden tombs astonish and captivate. But nothing brings Egypts past back to life like the mummies that survive it. Wrapped, embalmed, and buried with treasure for thousands of years, each mummy tells the story of the people - the criminals, priests, children and pharaohs - who lived the history weve come to know. Watch as Bettany takes the viewer through an extraordinary countdown of the faces behind the history, as she reveals stories of glimmering treasure, journeys into the afterlife, and cruel revenge - some of which are only coming to light after thousands of years.

programme.title: Greatest Treasures of the Ancient World
programme.desc: Professor Bettany Hughes returns to explore the extraordinary and captivating mummies of Ancient Egypt. Egypt has a history like no other: nestling between the desert and the Nile, its extraordinary pyramids, soaring temples, and hidden tombs astonish and captivate. But nothing brings Egypts past back to life like the mummies that survive it. Wrapped, embalmed, and buried with treasure for thousands of years, each mummy tells the story of the people - the criminals, priests, children and pharaohs - who made the history weve come to know. Watch as Bettany takes the viewer through an extraordinary countdown of the faces behind the history, as she reveals stories of glimmering treasure, journeys into the afterlife, and cruel revenge - some of which are only coming to light after thousands of years.

programme.title: Petra: Secrets of the Ancient Builders
programme.desc: In the heart of the Jordanian desert, the ancient city of Petra is full of mysteries. How was this architectural prowess achieved more than 2,000 years ago?

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: En route to the Shetland Islands, a high-tech turboprop is struck by lightning, temporarily blinding the crew and disabling their controls. The pilots declare a Mayday as the plane plunges into a terrifying nosedive. Just seconds before impact, they manage to regain control. And once theyre safely on the ground, investigators uncover an unusual feature in the plane that plays a key role in this calamity.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Egypt
programme.desc: Shrouded by mystery, the Lost Treasures of Egypt clears the sand away from your eyes in revealing the secrets of this Ancient Civilisation. From the Valley of Kings to the Pyramids of Giza, we uncover hidden tombs and foretell the stories of ruling pharaohs through the artefacts, that we find along the way. Following the excavations of international experts, we unearth historical context at various archaeological sites. At the end of this series, you should be enlightened with numerous Egyptian theories such as "mummification" and the Curse of the Afterlife. With royalty as Tutankhamun and Cleopatra, we explore the impacts these figures had at the time and the lasting dynasty they have since left behind, for modern Egypt.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Egypt
programme.desc: Shrouded by mystery, the Lost Treasures of Egypt clears the sand away from your eyes in revealing the secrets of this Ancient Civilisation. From the Valley of Kings to the Pyramids of Giza, we uncover hidden tombs and foretell the stories of ruling pharaohs through the artefacts, that we find along the way. Following the excavations of international experts, we unearth historical context at various archaeological sites. At the end of this series, you should be enlightened with numerous Egyptian theories such as "mummification" and the Curse of the Afterlife. With royalty as Tutankhamun and Cleopatra, we explore the impacts these figures had at the time and the lasting dynasty they have since left behind, for modern Egypt.

programme.title: Dark Secrets of the Sun
programme.desc: It contains 99.9 percent of all the matter in our solar system and sheds hot plasma at nearly a million miles an hour. The temperature at its core is a staggering 27 million degrees Fahrenheit. It convulses, it blazes, it sings. You know it as the sun. Scientists know it as one of the most amazing physics laboratories in the universe. Now, with the help of new spacecraft and Earth-based telescopes, scientists are seeing the sun as they never have before and even recreating what happens at its very center in labs here on Earth. Their work will help us understand aspects of the sun that have puzzled scientists for decades. But more critically, it may help us predict and track solar storms that have the power to zap our power grid, shut down telecommunications, and ground global air travel for days, weeks, or even longer. Such storms have happened before-but never in the modern era of satellite communication. "Dark Secrets of the Sun" reveals a bright new dawn in our understanding of our nearest star-one that might help keep our planet from going dark.

programme.title: Ghost Ships of the Great Lakes: Lost Beneath the Waves
programme.desc: The tempestuous Great Lakes are full of wrecks lost to the depths and time. In this update, new science reveals some of the exciting Great Lakes ship discoveries over the last decade, and allows for the exploration and recovery of recently discovered wrecks, including a mysterious group of ships that havent been seen since 1914.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Rome
programme.desc: Buried beneath Rome lies a forgotten treasure: the Golden House - a vast palace built in the first century AD. It was the most extravagant construction in the history of Rome. Why was it buried? And what can its fate reveal about its builder - Romes most notorious emperor - Nero? As experts race to save the remains of the Golden House, archaeologists uncover new clues to its fate and its connection to Neros reputation.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Rome
programme.desc: This new series follows international teams of archaeologists as they embark on a season of excavations to unravel the secrets of life in the Roman Empire. Crawling beneath Pompeii, unearthing an enormous lost coliseum, and hauling a 2000-year-old battleship ram from the depths of the ocean, they race to unlock the secrets of this ancient civilisation. In the series opener, archaeologists embark on new digs in Pompeii, to unravel the stories of the people who lived and died there. They race against the clock to unearth a sacrificial skull, uncover clues from the tomb and the mummified body of a curiously wealthy freed slave, and venture into stiflingly narrow tunnels beneath the central bathhouse.

programme.title: Rome Underground
programme.desc: Featuring the parallel stories of a supersize building project and a jaw-dropping archaeological adventure, Rome Underground takes viewers on an immersive journey deep under the Eternal City — revealing how the construction of a 26-kilometer subway line through the heart of historic Rome has literally unearthed some of the most important discoveries of the modern age. At the intersection of technology and archaeology, this documentary chronicles the ambitious mega-project from every angle. With state-of-the-art modelling and 3D animation, it brings the ancient world vividly to life.

programme.title: Gladiators: Warriors of the Ancient World
programme.desc: 75 BCE, Spartacus, a soldier enslaved by Rome and forced into gladiatorial combat leads fellow gladiators in a daring escape. Disaffected slaves join him, sparking a massive rebellion that defeats Roman legions. His story shows how closely linked gladiators were to the politics of the Roman Republic. Though hes ultimately defeated, his legacy lives on as a symbol of freedom.

programme.title: Cleopatras Final Secret
programme.desc: Archaeologist Kathleen Martinez is leading a thrilling detective hunt on land and underwater, to unearth the final pieces of the puzzle that will unlock the story of Cleopatras last days. Armed with the latest technology and the unparalleled skills of explorer Bob Ballard, she is guaranteed to make extraordinary discoveries. This could be the find of the century: Cleopatras Lost Tomb.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Egypt
programme.desc: Shrouded by mystery, the Lost Treasures of Egypt clears the sand away from your eyes in revealing the secrets of this Ancient Civilisation. From the Valley of Kings to the Pyramids of Giza, we uncover hidden tombs and foretell the stories of ruling pharaohs through the artefacts, that we find along the way. With royalty as Tutankhamun and Cleopatra, we explore the impacts these figures had at the time and the lasting dynasty they have since left behind, for modern Egypt.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: Extreme weather patterns have threatened ships and mariners for centuries. The perfect storm?. towering walls of water, powerful winds and churning seas can overwhelm any ship. What brought down the largest haul of Spanish treasure off the coast of Florida? And whats the truth behind the strange disappearance of the mightiest invasion force of ancient times? Drain the Oceans reveals the secrets of Stormy Seas.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: Archaeologists explore the coast of Oregon for the remains of a ship that sank over three hundred years ago. Native American oral histories tell of a shipwreck and its survivors. Porcelain and beeswax from the ship still wash up on shore. Archaeologists reconstruct their impression of the sunken wreck, using historical data and their own expertise, revealing how this giant ship carried hundreds of tons of cargo nearly halfway round the world.

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis and all the evidence. How did the nuclear reactor at 3 Mile Island meltdown? How did a small truck fire in the Mt Blanc road tunnel become a lethal inferno? How did the seven year old Sampoong department store in South Korea collapse onto hundreds of shoppers?

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: December 21, 1988. Shortly after taking off from Londons Heathrow Airport, Pan Am Flight 103 suddenly explodes in the skies above Lockerbie, Scotland. As the wreckage rains down on the small town below, homes are vaporized and fires break out across the countryside. All 259 people on board are killed. Eleven more in the tiny town also die. The wreckage is scattered over 2,000 square kilometers, and when investigators find proof the aircraft was the victim of a bomb, the area becomes the largest crime scene in the world. Who brought down Flight 103?

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: November 12th, 1996 - Shortly after take off from New Delhi, Saudi Airways Flight 763 levels off at 14,000 feet. As the crew waits for clearance to climb to their cruising altitude, the plane is hit by a Kazakhstan Airlines jet. The collision cripples both planes. They spiral violently to the ground, killing all 349 people on board. Its the worst mid-air collision in the history of aviation. The two wreckage fields are five miles apart. As investigators comb through the charred debris for evidence, they try and answer troubling questions: Why did the two planes collide? Whos responsible? And can they stop it before it happens again?

programme.title: Close Encounters of the Wild Kind
programme.desc: Urban Jungle. As humans take up more space in our growing cities, animals adapt. Find out why the rhino crossed the road and how monkeys use the metro.

programme.title: Close Encounters of the Wild Kind
programme.desc: The Big Blue. Want to know why an octopus would slap a kayaker or why a sea snake might want to be best friends? Take a deep dive into some of the craziest clips to discover whats really going on.

programme.title: Close Encounters of the Wild Kind
programme.desc: Safari Showdown. A safari can be a dream come true, but when elephants crush cars and hippos chase speedboats, it can also be a nightmare.

programme.title: Close Encounters of the Wild Kind
programme.desc: Our homes are meant to be safe havens, but wild animals are increasingly showing up uninvited.

programme.title: Close Encounters of the Wild Kind
programme.desc: The Big Blue. Want to know why an octopus would slap a kayaker or why a sea snake might want to be best friends? Take a deep dive into some of the craziest clips to discover whats really going on.

programme.title: Lake Tanganyika: Africas Blue Heart
programme.desc: Lake Tanganyika, one of the largest lakes on earth, combines two different yet equally magical worlds: an untouched wilderness along the shores, home to chimpanzees, elephants and antelopes and a spectacularly diverse underwater universe.

programme.title: Close Encounters of the Wild Kind
programme.desc: Safari Showdown. A safari can be a dream come true, but when elephants crush cars and hippos chase speedboats, it can also be a nightmare.

programme.title: Hostile Planet
programme.desc: HOSTILE PLANET is a ground-breaking wildlife series that explores Earths most hostile environments. Over the course of six episodes, we explore the extremes of deep, high, cold, hot, wet and dry and reveal the truly extraordinary ways in which animals have adapted to survive in the face of great adversity. Its always been a HOSTILE PLANET and yet, in the last 40 years, its got a whole lot tougher for the wildlife. The world has changed more in the last 40 years than at any time in the last 65 million. So animals in the most hostile places on Earth must adapt in the blink of an evolutionary eye. Facing everything from intrinsically hostile habitats and brutally punishing weather to the unrelenting threat of predators and intense competition for resources, their challenge is simple: adapt or die.

programme.title: Winters Hidden Wonders
programme.desc: Winter is the most punishing of seasons, a time of year when many animals seek shelter in order to hibernate, but others must face the harshness of their environment. This documentary series showcases the ruthless beauty of this icy season, revealing the animals who thrive in their freezing conditions and the animals who simply fight for survival. When the season finally passes spring is reborn, and it is a celebration for those who managed to survive unscathed.

programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations
programme.desc: They are the backbone of the natural world, and in this documentary series, we explore some of the most interesting and amazing animals that roam our planet. Each episode focusses on two special creatures, revealing their characteristics and behaviours, and feature interviews with various experts alongside stunning video footage of the animals in their natural environments. A fascinating series that explores the animals instincts and anatomies using state-of-the-art cameras and graphics, the creatures featured include polar bears, tigers, octopuses, elephants and orangutans.

programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations
programme.desc: They are the backbone of the natural world, and in this documentary series, we explore some of the most interesting and amazing animals that roam our planet. Each episode focusses on two special creatures, revealing their characteristics and behaviours, and feature interviews with various experts alongside stunning video footage of the animals in their natural environments. A fascinating series that explores the animals instincts and anatomies using state-of-the-art cameras and graphics, the creatures featured include polar bears, tigers, octopuses, elephants and orangutans.

programme.title: Freaks and Creep
programme.desc: Lucy Cooke is on a one-woman mission to show why the ugly, weird and overlooked animals of the world can be cute, cuddly and deserving of attention. Join her as she heads off to the rainforests of Borneo. Borneo is its own very unique crucible of weirdness - with countless strange creatures that can only be found there. Lucys goal is get up close with the giant-nosed proboscis monkey to figure out why this creature looks so strange. Along the way, she finds many other "odd ones" - animals that have come up with all kinds of strange adaptations so they can survive in the forest of Borneo. Lucy finds dung beetles in action - eating dung; frogs that fly; a tarsier, with eyes that are bigger than its brain; and the wooly bat that makes its home is a carnivorous plant

programme.title: Extraordinary Australia
programme.desc: Australias coastline is a true natural wonder, encompassing a diverse range of bountiful habitats. Coastal seas and lands are realms of epic migrations, mesmerising mating rituals and high stakes battles between predator and prey.

programme.title: Strangest Nature
programme.desc: Gaze into the realm of gulpers: animals who waste no time eating their prey — often swallowing it whole.

programme.title: Freaks and Creep
programme.desc: Lucy Cooke is on a one-woman mission to show why the ugly, weird and overlooked animals of the world can be cute, cuddly and deserving of attention. Join her as she heads off to the rainforests of Borneo. Borneo is its own very unique crucible of weirdness - with countless strange creatures that can only be found there. Lucys goal is get up close with the giant-nosed proboscis monkey to figure out why this creature looks so strange. Along the way, she finds many other "odd ones" - animals that have come up with all kinds of strange adaptations so they can survive in the forest of Borneo. Lucy finds dung beetles in action - eating dung; frogs that fly; a tarsier, with eyes that are bigger than its brain; and the wooly bat that makes its home is a carnivorous plant

programme.title: Extraordinary Australia
programme.desc: Australias coastline is a true natural wonder, encompassing a diverse range of bountiful habitats. Coastal seas and lands are realms of epic migrations, mesmerising mating rituals and high stakes battles between predator and prey.

programme.title: Australias Wild Woodlands
programme.desc: "Australias Wild Woodlands" explores the rich biodiversity and resilience of Australias eucalyptus forests, home to the worlds largest variety of parrots and iconic species like the platypus. These woodlands span vast regions and support diverse wildlife, from red kangaroos to freshwater crocodiles. The film showcases the rare behaviors of marsupials and birds, highlighting threats from climate change and land clearing. Ancient ecosystems remain largely unchanged since the dinosaurs, but species like the Gouldian finch face uncertain futures. Through intimate storytelling, the documentary reveals the ecological importance and fragility of these vibrant landscapes.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: Freaks and Creep
programme.desc: Typically South Africa is known for the Big Five: lions, leopards, buffalo, elephants and rhinos. But not for Lucy Cooke, advocate and avenger for the lesser-known and unloved animals of the world. Lucys on a hunt for the more enigmatic Freaky Five: Cape vultures, sungazer girdled lizards, golden-brown baboon tarantulas, ground pangolins, and chacma baboons. The Freaky Five are all important to South Africans and their traditions. Mystical and mysterious, these five animals represent a side of South African culture that the tourists and conservation donors both often overlook. But Lucy Cooke is on a mission to change all of that!

programme.title: Worlds Weirdest
programme.desc: Worlds Weirdest is a documentary series revolving around the strangest, freakiest, weirdest animals and their behaviors in the animal kingdom. Take this amazing journey to the animal world and have a look at creatures who survive in extreme environments, alien-looking body parts and camouflage, fish that can change its sex, toads that explode, koalas and their disgusting diet and all kinds of other weirdest creatures Mother Nature has to offer.

programme.title: Freaks and Creep
programme.desc: Lucy Cooke is on a one-woman mission to show why the ugly, weird and overlooked animals of the world can be cute, cuddly and deserving of attention. Join her as she heads off to the rainforests of Borneo. Borneo is its own very unique crucible of weirdness - with countless strange creatures that can only be found there. Lucys goal is get up close with the giant-nosed proboscis monkey to figure out why this creature looks so strange. programme.title: Madagascars Weirdest
programme.desc: Madagascar is a stunning island, full of unique wildlife and plants. This series introduces a variety of Madagascars strangest and most extraordinary creatures, that found home in its jungles and forests. Tune in and see large lemurs, worlds heaviest chameleons, and more.

programme.title: Borneos Secret Kingdom: Weird And Wild
programme.desc: The first episode of Borneos Secret Kingdom introduces the Kinabatangan River - a powerhouse of nature flowing from the heart of Borneo. Fuelled by yearly monsoons it courses through a hub of diversity. A nexus of powerful forces has created the most species-rich area on the planet. Clouded Leopards stalk primates, and Flying Snakes perform death-defying leaps.

programme.title: Madagascars Weirdest Compilation
programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. Madagascar is an island nation set adrift for millions of years, leaving its wildlife in extreme isolation and causing some bizarre adaptations. Many of the creatures here are found nowhere else on earth.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of these cute creatures from northern New Mexico. "Prairie Dog Manor" showcases the unique behaviour of these special animals and highlights the different relationships that exist between the clan members from Valles Caldera National Preserve. Beginning with the prairie dogs preparing for the coming winter, Carl and the pups get ready for hibernation. But they face danger from an unlikely source as deadly predators forge an alliance to threaten every dog in the territory. Further episodes explore the mating season when the warm weather arrives and battles commence between the males to earn the right to mate with the females. Soon, the females are pregnant and new pups arrive and the whole cycle starts again.

programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations
programme.desc: They are the backbone of the natural world, and in this documentary series, we explore some of the most interesting and amazing animals that roam our planet. Each episode focusses on two special creatures, revealing their characteristics and behaviours, and feature interviews with various experts alongside stunning video footage of the animals in their natural environments. A fascinating series that explores the animals instincts and anatomies using state-of-the-art cameras and graphics, the creatures featured include polar bears, tigers, octopuses, elephants and orangutans.

programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations
programme.desc: They are the backbone of the natural world, and in this documentary series, we explore some of the most interesting and amazing animals that roam our planet. Each episode focusses on two special creatures, revealing their characteristics and behaviours, and feature interviews with various experts alongside stunning video footage of the animals in their natural environments. A fascinating series that explores the animals instincts and anatomies using state-of-the-art cameras and graphics, the creatures featured include polar bears, tigers, octopuses, elephants and orangutans.

programme.title: Valley of the Wolves
programme.desc: Imagine a place that holds everything youve ever wanted. High slopes and good timber for cover and den sites. Water. Your very own herds to hunt and all the wide open space you need for the chase. But others of your kind also want this place. They will challenge you for it. How far will you go to defend it? In the northeast corner of Yellowstone, the wolves of the Druid Peak Pack have long held sway, but their power is waning. The old leaders of the clan cannot stand against the challenge of the invading Slough Creek Pack. But the conquering wolves will find this no safe haven. Here, they will meet a strange and terrible fate. And though in exile, the Druids will rebuild their clan and gather the strength to return. In this beautiful but dangerous place, there is bounty and cruelty, loyalty and banishment, triumph and death. This is the story of the battle for the perfect valley and the high price wolves will pay for paradise.

programme.title: Serengeti Speed Queen
programme.desc: Nzuri, a first-time Mom, is forced to add strategy to speed in order to avoid predators, feed her cubs and steer them successfully to adulthood

programme.title: Kingdom of the White Wolf
programme.desc: Join Ronan Donovan, a National Geographic Explorer and photographer, as he takes the viewer on a unique adventure to track down the hard-to-find Arctic wolf. The series follows the year-long travails of a family of Arctic wolves on Ellesmere Island, from the first breaking light after the long winter, through the life-bringing springtime, the fattening summer months and the preparations of autumn. Each episode deals with different obstacles that the wolves face and have to overcome and, along the way, we the various characters and personalities of the animal family are revealed. The show makes good use of intimate footage to make the viewer feel that they are actually there, observing the creatures up close.

programme.title: Heartland Docs
programme.desc: While Dr. Ben tends to older horses, Dr. Erin investigates an elderly dogs mysterious shedding. Together, they give a frisky feline a makeover and treat a cows serious eye infection. Later, the family squeezes in some much-needed family time as they set sail on their new boat.

programme.title: Heartland Docs
programme.desc: Dr. Ben is thrilled to pass along tricks of the trade to the next generation while examining award-winning cows and repairing a turtles busted shell. Meanwhile, when a kitten suddenly attacks its own tail, Dr. Erin jumps into action. Together with Dr. Ben, the docs aid a young calf with an extra appendage.

programme.title: Africas Hunters
programme.desc: Large carnivores such as leopards, lions and hyenas are in constant competition for their next meal for their pack in Zambias Luangwa Valley. Following the lives of the wise old leopard Kamuti who rained over the prime territory in the Luangwa Valley for 10 years, a six-week-old lion cub and a clan of spotted hyenas, this documentary series allows audiences to see these magnificent animals like never before. With up-close imagery of animals existing within Luangwa Valley and their life in the wild, feel a part of the pack with Africas Hunters.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš pieskata krokodilu bērneļus. Dora un Zābaciņš pierunā Trolli nogaršot empanadu Benija kioskā. Zābaciņš uzlaiko Tiko izgudrotus zābakus. Dvīņi priecājas par savu pirmo pinjatu, bet neviens nezina, kā to dabūt vaļā.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora atgriežas ar jauniem, fantastiskiem piedzīvojumiem maģiskajā lietus mežā! Pievienojies visīpašākajam bērnam - pētniekam un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam, kad viņi satiek jaunus draugus! Nekas nav neiespējams! Aiziet!

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma svin savas dzimšanas dienas. Barbabellai darba pilnas rokas, pieskatot pārējos. Barbabella pieskata Bali kaķēnus. Viņa baidās, kaut kas var noiet greizi, tāpēc nelaiž tos ārā. Barbamammai jāpalīdz kaķēniem.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Ķīmiskas villas padara lauku apvidu rožainu. Barbapapas uzbūvē putnu māju, lai pasargātu sasirgušos putnus. Ieraugot piesārņotu pludmali, Barbapapu ģimene izlemj to uzkopt. No drazām top mini golfa laukums.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Ķīmiskas villas padara lauku apvidu rožainu. Barbapapas uzbūvē putnu māju, lai pasargātu sasirgušos putnus. Ieraugot piesārņotu pludmali, Barbapapu ģimene izlemj to uzkopt. No drazām top mini golfa laukums.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabo neprot zīmēt. Viņam piemetas žagas, no kurām netiek vaļā. Viņš jau grasās padoties, kad nejauši rada jaunu mākslas novirzienu. Barbaliba grib piedalīties rakstīšanas konkursā, taču brāļi un māsas neļauj koncentrēties.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Braucot ar riteņiem Barbapapu ģimene atrod viduslaiku pils drupas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Mērei Greitvejai vajag daudz picas, un ātri! Bet, kad pieslēdzas Ātrmeistars, suņiem jānovērš viņa picas problēma. Kad ģimene pa Ātrmeistara ceļu nevar pagūt uz lidostu, Rabla komandai līdz izlidošanai jāuzbūvē jauns ceļš.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Mēre Greitveja un Dakija Dū kungs vēlas nodemonstrēt savas izpletņlēkšanas prasmes. Taču, kad patraucē vējš, suņi palīdz viņiem lēkt ar izpletni uz zemes! Kad Vīleram un cūkai Trifelei nesanāk slidot, komanda rod risinājumu uz riteņiem!

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni - Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals - suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss - suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi - katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu - sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts - Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbaliba, Barbalala un Barbabella pēc kārtas stāsta stāstu. Katra iekļauj tajā ko ļoti personīgu. Barbapapu ģimene pavada dienu pludmalē. Sadalījušies 2 komandās, barbabērni cīnās par smilšu pussalu.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: No kalna izbēdzis āzis izraisa haosu, aprīdams visu, kas pagadās! Bali nekur nav atrodama, un Barbapapa liek lietā savu attapību, meklējot viņu. Viņi pat nenojauš, kāds pārsteigums viņus gaida.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims cenšas būt divos pasākumos reizē. Tims meklē Kajai uzkodu bez purvzāles. Pēc vairākiem zaudējumiem Tija cenšas uzvarēt visās ballīšu spēlēs.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora atgriežas ar jauniem, fantastiskiem piedzīvojumiem maģiskajā lietus mežā! Pievienojies visīpašākajam bērnam - pētniekam un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam, kad viņi satiek jaunus draugus! Nekas nav neiespējams! Aiziet!

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabērni pielipuši pie televizora, tāpēc vecāki mudina viņus veidot raidījumus. Barbapapas apmeklē evolūcijas muzeju. Programmā: Zemes radīšana, Pirmskembrija perioda zemūdene un... dinozauri!

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbazū gatavs palīdzēt, bet Barbagudrais un Barbabella ļaunprātīgi izmanto viņa labestību un padara viņu traku. Barbazū nejauši atklāj spēju atdarināt Barbatēti. Viņš to izmanto, lai sadalītu darbus brāļiem un māsām. Vai viņi to uzzinās?

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs, Tija un tētis netiek prom attāla asteroīda. Tims, Kaja un Tomijs cenšas dabūt laukā bumbu no mammas istabas. Tims cenšas dabūt lejā Tijas jauno balonu, kas ieķēries kokā.

programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pirmās Celtnieklīča bibliotēkas būvēšana ir bišu pilna. Tas pieprasa īpaši saldu celtniecības risinājumu. / Vectēvs Grants māca Čārdžeram visus savus labākos deju soļus lielām deju sacensībām. Vai noklīdušas disko bumbas dēļ viņi neiegūs pirmo vietu?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ir Tanšu diena! Vai ķepaiņi paspēs uzbūvēt dāvanu tantei Celtnei?

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora rāda dvīņiem mūzikas lādīti, kuras mazā dejotāja atdzīvojas! Kad aizbēg viņas burvju zābaciņi, draugi dodas tos meklēt. Saule nevar iemigt, tāpēc atsakās norietēt! Dorai jāatrod Spilvenmākonis, lai Saule varētu doties pie miera.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija apmaldās izklaides centrā. Tims meklē jaunu, sev piemērotu raķeti. Kad Terija pieskata bērnus, Tims cenšas apiet visus noteikumus.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Ģimene skatās "Detektīvu Kartupeli". Arī Pepa un Džordžs grib būt detektīvi. Tētis uzdod viņiem atrisināt mistēriju. Tedijs ir paslēpts, un Pepai kopā ar Džordžu jāizmanto palielināmais stikls, lai sekotu drupaču takai un atrisinātu noslēpumu.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Ir laiks doties pie miera, Pepai un Džordžam ir jāiet vannā. Pēc tam viņi izmazgā zobus un lien gultā. Drīz vien viņi aizmieg. Mamma un tētis beidzot apsēžas, bet ir bijusi gara diena un arī viņi ir miegaini.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Vecākus pārsteidz aizvien vairāku reklāmas izkārtņu parādīšanās gar viņu ceļu. Gaisma no reklāmām ir tik spoža, ka naktī vairs nevar saskatīt zvaigznes un visur ir tik daudz stabu! Pietiks! Ģimenei jārīkojas! // Barbalala vēlas kļūt par kovbojmeiteni un Barbazū ir apņēmies viņai palīdzēt. Lai to panāktu, viņai jāiemācās aprūpēt govis un bulli. Tas nav viegli, bet, ja viņa pacentīsies, viņa būs lieliska kovbojmeitene.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pastāsta pārējiem, cik vareni bija Da Vinči izgudrojumi un nu katrs grib izgudrot ko savu. Ģēniju ir maz, bet ir jautri izgudrot. // Bērniem jāizvēlas - doties baseinā vai izbraukt ar riteņiem. Uzreiz izveidojas divas frontes un tikai Barbazū spēj nosvērt izvēles svarus.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Maksam ir netipisks mīlulis - Haizivsuns, kurš ir pa pusei haizivs, pa pusei suns. Sākumā Makss cenšas paturēt Haizivsuni noslēpumā, bet Fogijspringsā draugi, ziņkārīgi kaimiņi un pat Maksa vecāki ar laiku pamanīs Maksa jauno, rotaļīgo labāko draugu.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Maksam ir netipisks mīlulis - Haizivsuns, kurš ir pa pusei haizivs, pa pusei suns. Sākumā Makss cenšas paturēt Haizivsuni noslēpumā, bet Fogijspringsā draugi, ziņkārīgi kaimiņi un pat Maksa vecāki ar laiku pamanīs Maksa jauno, rotaļīgo labāko draugu.

Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabo neprot zīmēt. Viņam piemetas žagas, no kurām netiek vaļā. Viņš jau grasās padoties, kad nejauši rada jaunu mākslas novirzienu. Barbaliba grib piedalīties rakstīšanas konkursā, taču brāļi un māsas neļauj koncentrēties.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabravo kā slepenais aģents vada izmeklēšanu, bruņojies ar saviem rīkiem, lai uzzinātu, kurš nozaga Barbatēta torti. Barbalala ir pārliecināta, ka dzirdēja milzu vistu klīstam pa māju. Barbabērni stāv sardzē.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs, Tija un omīte ir dārgumu meklējumos. Ir Rūkoņas svētki, un Tims grib, lai viņa rūciens ir labākais. Tims, Tomijs un Tija savā mājā atrod pazudušu mamutu.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims nopērk labākos cepumus pilsētā, bet drīz saprot, ka citiem tos vajag vairāk nekā viņam.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims un Kaja meklē pludmalē apraktos niekus.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Arvien jauni piedzīvojumi ar Doru! Piebiedrojies drošajai pētniecei Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu brīnumainajos piedzīvojumos - no došanās palīgā dzīvniekiem kopā ar Djego līdz apburtas nāru pasaules glābšanai.

programme.title: Dora

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa dodas uz zebras Zojas pidžamu ballīti kopā ar aitiņu Sūziju, trusīti Rebeku, kaķenīti Kendiju un zilonīti Emīliju. Meitenes spēlē spēles un izklaidējas. Beidzot viņām uznāk miegs. Viņas iekārtojas guļammaisos un aizmieg.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pedro ir lipīgs klepus, drīz vien saslimst arī pārējie bērni. Kad laiks doties, saslimst arī pieaugušie. Arī Gazeles jaunkundze. Dakteris Lācis iedod negaršīgas zāles, bet kas rūpēsies par viņu, kad viņš saslims?

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Haizivsuns nejauši izdzēš Maksa mammas darba video un kopā ar Maksu cenšas nofilmēt jaunu reportāžu ar komandas palīdzību.

programme.title: Haizivsuns

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Makss atklāj, ka daļa mistiskās kartes ir kļuvusi redzama. Haizivsuņa komanda cenšas atklāt pārējo karti.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabella pieskata Bali kaķēnus. Viņa baidās, kaut kas var noiet greizi, tāpēc nelaiž tos ārā. Barbamammai jāpalīdz kaķēniem.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcī tiek uzbūvēta pirmā viesnīca, kad ciemos atbrauc fermeres Zojas brālēns Hedlijs. Kad juceklis uz dabas takas apmulsina visus Dakija Dū kunga dzimšanas dienas ballītes viesus, ķepaiņi viņiem palīdz atrast ceļu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Bodnieks Gabriels rīko savu gardumu izstādi, un Rabla komanda dodas palīgā.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora atgriežas ar jauniem, fantastiskiem piedzīvojumiem maģiskajā lietus mežā! Pievienojies visīpašākajam bērnam - pētniekam un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam, kad viņi satiek jaunus draugus! Nekas nav neiespējams! Aiziet!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš satiek vientuļniekvēzīti Šelliju, kura pazaudējusi savu čaulu un paslēpjas Zābaciņa zābakā. Dora dodas meklēt Šellijas mitekli. Tētis rīko kesadilju pikniku, bet ir aizmirsis mājās visas sastāvdaļas! Dora apņemas tās aizgādāt.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabērni sagatavo izrādi Barbamammai dzimšanas dienā. Kamēr Barbalala uzkopj, viņi sodas uz lunaparku, kur Barbabo iesprūst karuselī. Trīs atsevišķi stāsti saplūst kopā pagalma vidū.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbaliba, Barbalala un Barbabella pēc kārtas stāsta stāstu. Katra iekļauj tajā ko ļoti personīgu. Barbapapu ģimene pavada dienu pludmalē. Sadalījušies 2 komandās, barbabērni cīnās par smilšu pussalu.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: No kalna izbēdzis āzis izraisa haosu, aprīdams visu, kas pagadās! Bali nekur nav atrodama, un Barbapapa liek lietā savu attapību, meklējot viņu. Viņi pat nenojauš, kāds pārsteigums viņus gaida.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais izturas dīvaini. Ko viņš slēpj? Barbabērni darīs visu, lai to uzzinātu. Barbapapas izlemj taupīt elektrību, taču viņu ieceri izjauc Barbagudrais un Barbabella, kas izgudrojuši slepenu elektrību patērējošu projektu.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbapapa un Lolita ceļo gaisa balonā, bet vētra viņus aiznes uz vientuļu salu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un suņi atrod vectēva Grants laimīgi boulinga bumbu. Diemžēl Celtnieklīcī nav boulinga zāles... līdz šim! Kad pēkšņa superziedēšana sagūsta Motori, Liliju un Parka Reindžeri Rozu, suņiem jārod ziediem draudzīgs risinājums.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni - Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals - suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss - suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi - katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu - sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts - Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais izturas dīvaini. Ko viņš slēpj? Barbabērni darīs visu, lai to uzzinātu. Barbapapas izlemj taupīt elektrību, taču viņu ieceri izjauc Barbagudrais un Barbabella, kas izgudrojuši slepenu elektrību patērējošu projektu.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabērni pielipuši pie televizora, tāpēc vecāki mudina viņus veidot raidījumus. Barbapapas apmeklē evolūcijas muzeju. Programmā: Zemes radīšana, Pirmskembrija perioda zemūdene un... dinozauri!

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims dara visu, lai tiktu pie jaunās Dinozvaigznes figūriņas. Ir Astro-joku diena, bet Tims nezina, kad apstāties. Timam un tētim jānoķer traucējošs kurmis.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Zābaciņš un Dora dodas uz Banānkalnu, lai nogādātu Isai dāvanu - Zābaciņa apgleznotu puķu podu! Dora kopā ar draugiem rīko dzimšanas dienas pārsteiguma ballīti Garnadzim. Ceļā uz svinībām Garnadzis mēģina nočiept pats savu dāvanu!

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Pēc piedzīvotām likstām Barbabravo vairs nemaz nespēj pārtapt. Visa ģimene dodas viņam palīgā. Barbabravo nespēj nosēdēt mierā un ilgi koncentrēties vienai nodarbei. Barbalala piedāvā iemācīt viņam kontroli. Vai viņai izdosies?

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabērni domā, ka ēdiens spēj likt tiem mainīt krāsu un formu, tāpēc izlemj atrast katram piemēroto ēdienu. Barbabo nav iedvesmas, tāpēc vairs nespēj radīt. Visa ģimene palīdz, iesakot jaunas zīmējumu tēmas.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija nevar izlemt, ko dāvināt omītei. Tims uzņem pats savu Kapteiņa Dinozvaigznes filmu. Tims izliekas, lai pierādītu, ka ir tikpat foršs, cik Kajas brālēns.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīci ir pārņēmis noslēpums. Kad pēkšņi pazūd pilsētnieku skulptūra, Rabla komandai pievienojas Čeiss, lai atrisinātu pazudušās statujas noslēpumu... un uzbūvētu gluži jaunu Zinātnes centru, lai palīdzētu izmeklēt.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa ķepaiņu celtnieku ģimene pārceļas uz kaimiņpilsētu Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, rotaļājas un būvē visu kopienai nepieciešamo.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dorai, Zābaciņam un Benijam jādodas cauri lietusmežam, lai nogādātu Benija vecmammai lielu, skaistu piena kūku. Dora palīdz Fiestas trio noskaidrot, kas rada skaļo, savādo troksni, kura dēļ viņi pazaudējuši savus instrumentus.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims un Tomijs izpalīdz Dino-veikalā.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims un Tomijs cenšas izaudzēt vislielāko astro-ķirbi.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tija un Tomijs cenšas pārliecināt mammu un tēti par labu mīlulim.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa un Džordžs palīdz mammai uzkopt pēc brokastīm. Mamma stāsta, ka pudeles jāliek zaļā tvertnē, lai tās pārstrādātu. Vecās avīzes liek sarkanajā kastē, bet bundžas - zilajā. Pepa un Džordžs ar prieku piepilda tvertnes.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Tētis paskaidro Barbabravo un Barbalalai, ka viņi var spēlēties, kā vēlas, bet bērni nesaprot, ka tētis neļāva viņiem kļūt par maziem dumpiniekiem. // Kas ir Barbapapas? Viņi ir dažādās krāsās, spēj transformēties, daži ir spalvaini. Atbildi var atras tikai Barbazinātne.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbalala rīko lielo talantu konkursu. Katram barbabērnam uz skatuves jādemonstrē savs lielākais talants, nekādas nīkuļošanas! // Videospēles ir jautras, bet jāmāk izbaudīt jauki laikapstākļi. Vecāki izlemj bērniem radīt jautras rotaļas ārā. Bet lomas un mīklas jādala uzmanīgi, lai nerodas pārsteīgumi.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Maksam ir netipisks mīlulis - Haizivsuns, kurš ir pa pusei haizivs, pa pusei suns. Sākumā Makss cenšas paturēt Haizivsuni noslēpumā, bet Fogijspringsā draugi, ziņkārīgi kaimiņi un pat Maksa vecāki ar laiku pamanīs Maksa jauno, rotaļīgo labāko draugu.
